crew_archetypes.name: Comandante Sela
crew_archetypes.flavor: Hija de Tasha Yar y un oficial romulano, Sela colaboró para desestabilizar a la Federación.

crew_archetypes.name: Sela in Shadow
crew_archetypes.flavor: This shadowy figure is the daughter of an alternate timeline Tasha Yar and is sent to drive a wedge between the UFP and the Klingons.

action.name: With Our Cloaking Devices, We Can Slip By You At Will

crew_archetypes.name: Devor
crew_archetypes.flavor: A mercenary who boarded Enterprise-D planning to use preparations for a baryon sweep as cover to steal trilithium resin.

action.name: You're Starfleet. You Won't Kill Me

crew_archetypes.name: Leck
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ferengi eliminator who cared more for combat than currency. He called out Quark’s attempt to cheat him, but also asked to join future jobs.

crew_archetypes.name: Damron
crew_archetypes.flavor: Damron was a Xindi-Reptilian scientist responsible for the development of a bio-weapon to destroy humanity.

crew_archetypes.name: Rayna Kapec
crew_archetypes.flavor: Rayna's feelings were supposed to be the final step in her development, according to her creator. But they are exactly what destroyed the android.

action.name: I Was Not Human. Now I Love. I Love.

crew_archetypes.name: Gul Evek
crew_archetypes.flavor: While in hot pursuit of the Val Jean, Gul Evek's own ship hit a plasma storm and suddenly he had much bigger concerns.

action.name: Cut Your Engines And Prepare To Surrender

crew_archetypes.name: Mudd androide
crew_archetypes.flavor: Hasta el Mudd androide tiene un pico de oro y un cuchillo escondido en la bota para escabullirse de situaciones imposibles.

crew_archetypes.name: Harry Mudd
crew_archetypes.flavor: A cunning smuggler, he manages to evade justice time and time again, only to move on to his next criminal pursuit.

action.name: Leo Walsh Is Me Name, Darling

crew_archetypes.name: King Mudd the First
crew_archetypes.flavor: Mudd would not have been Mudd if, having found himself on the planet where he was appointed king, he had not started his illegal affairs.

action.name: But Men Will Always Be Men No Matter Where They Are

crew_archetypes.name: Tripulante Tarses
crew_archetypes.flavor: Mitad romulano, mitad humano y miembro de la Flota Estelar que fue destinado al U.S.S. Enterprise-D.

crew_archetypes.name: Moll
crew_archetypes.flavor: Moll is confident that Progenitor technology can bring her anything she needs, including bringing the dead back to life.

action.name: I Know What It's Like To Be On The Outside, Alone

crew_archetypes.name: Moll & L'ak
crew_archetypes.flavor: Desperate and in love, Moll and L'ak are ready to go together until the end, even if it means breaking a thousand laws.

crew_archetypes.name: Lenore Karidian
crew_archetypes.flavor: A charming actress, she infiltrated the Enterprise, offering to put on a performance of Hamlet in order to kill anyone who knew of her father’s brutal past.

action.name: I Didn't Think We'd Be Meeting Again So Soon

crew_archetypes.name: Laas
crew_archetypes.flavor: Laas, un cambiante que vivió en el cuadrante Alfa, podía adoptar una gran variedad de formas, incluso criaturas con capacidad de curvatura.

crew_archetypes.name: Consejero xindi-acuático
crew_archetypes.flavor: Como parte del consejo xindi, el consejero xindi-acuático debate con Archer sobre si los creadores de esferas les mintieron.

crew_archetypes.name: Comandante Spock
crew_archetypes.flavor: Spock, segundo comandante y primer oficial a bordo del USS Enterprise, se convertiría en un miembro admirado de la Federación.

crew_archetypes.name: Spock en recuperación
crew_archetypes.flavor: El comandante Spock se recuperó en Vulcano y pasó mucho tiempo ejercitando su lógica.

crew_archetypes.name: Spock del espejo
crew_archetypes.flavor: Como primer oficial del ISS Enterprise, Spock fue un oficial implacable en el universo espejo del Imperio terrano.

crew_archetypes.name: Embajador Spock
crew_archetypes.flavor: Tras desaparecer de forma abrupta, el embajador Spock apareció en Rómulo participando en un movimiento de reunificación entre romulanos y vulcanos.

crew_archetypes.name: Spock kal-if-fee
crew_archetypes.flavor: Como combatiente en el concurso de kal-if-fee tradicional, Spock se ve obligado a luchar a muerte con Kirk.

crew_archetypes.name: Spock de Talos IV
crew_archetypes.flavor: Prior to serving with Captain Kirk, Spock accompanied Captain Pike on an away mission to Talos IV.

crew_archetypes.name: Spock trabajador
crew_archetypes.flavor: Construye un circuito de memoria mnemónica utilizando «cuchillos de piedra y pieles de oso».

action.name: Cuchillos de piedra y pieles de oso
La lógica es el principio de la sabiduría
Veamos qué nos depara el futuro

crew_archetypes.name: Spock con traje medioambiental
crew_archetypes.flavor: Al sentir una conexión con la conciencia de V-ger, Spock robó equipamiento para buscar respuestas.

crew_archetypes.name: Spock del fal-tor-pan
crew_archetypes.flavor: Tras someterse a la ceremonia del fal-tor-pan, un Spock resucitado comienza a encajar los fragmentos de su memoria.

crew_archetypes.name: Spock y Kirk de reunión
crew_archetypes.flavor: Mientras Spock recobra sus recuerdos, Kirk y la tripulación se reúnen a su alrededor en solidaridad.

action.name: He sido y siempre seré su amigo

crew_archetypes.name: Spock tribble
crew_archetypes.flavor: Spock sugiere que la causa de la muerte de los tribble tiene que ver con el grano que comían.

action.name: Una criatura de lo más curioso

crew_archetypes.name: Spock e I-Chaya
crew_archetypes.flavor: Spock se reencuentra con su compañero sehlat de la infancia al investigar su propia desaparición de la historia.

crew_archetypes.name: Spock platoniano
crew_archetypes.flavor: Spock se convierte en un juguete telequinético tras no poder apelar al sentido de la lógica de los platonianos.

action.name: Cuídense, señoritas, y valoren su vino...

crew_archetypes.name: Prisionero Spock
crew_archetypes.flavor: Con la ayuda de los talosianos, Spock le muestra a Burnham cómo y por qué escapó del hospital, y que no mató a nadie.

crew_archetypes.name: Lt. Commander Spock
crew_archetypes.flavor: Spock begins his tenure on the Enterprise under the command of Captain Pike.

crew_archetypes.name: Wizard Pollux Spock
crew_archetypes.flavor: Pollux the wizard, brother of Caster. Maybe Spock is another victim of the fantasy illusion from “The Kingdom of Elysian”, but my god! Look at that hair!

crew_archetypes.name: Spock as T'Pring
crew_archetypes.flavor: The soul-sharing ritual went wrong, but this could be a relationship opportunity for Spock. He deals with T’Pring’s duties in his own style.

action.name: This Is Coming Dangerously Close To Antics

crew_archetypes.name: Paradise Spock
crew_archetypes.flavor: On Omicron Ceti III, Spock is exposed to euphoric flower spores that provide pleasure and enjoyment.

crew_archetypes.name: Valeo Beta V Spock
crew_archetypes.flavor: While looking for survivors on Valeo Beta V, Spock must confront the terrifying force of his own emotions.

action.name: Captain, There's More Blood Over Here

crew_archetypes.name: Projector Spock
crew_archetypes.flavor: Spock finds comedy a difficult concept to grasp, as his blooper reel at the holiday party is more about pain than pleasure.

crew_archetypes.name: Henoch Spock
crew_archetypes.flavor: Spock's body was taken over by the Arretan Henoch, who, using Spock, intended to kill Sargon in Kirk's body.

action.name: Just Think How Much We Can Do For Mankind

crew_archetypes.name: Orion Hurricane Spock
crew_archetypes.flavor: Spock discovers that his arms have become too flexible. The crew begins to wonder what is really in the cocktails.

action.name: My Arms Don't Normally Do This

crew_archetypes.name: Klingon Ambassador Spock
crew_archetypes.flavor: Spock goes to the Klingons to settle the misunderstanding between them over bloodwine.

crew_archetypes.name: Engaged Spock
crew_archetypes.flavor: Spock temporarily lost his Vulcan DNA. But with dinner ahead with T’Pring’s parents, he cannot reveal that he has become human.

crew_archetypes.name: Ensign Rollins
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ensign Rollins was a tactical officer, but took command of the bridge when Voyager was flung into the Delta Quadrant.

crew_archetypes.name: Capitán Pike
crew_archetypes.flavor: Segundo capitán del Enterprise clase Constitución, el capitán Pike es famoso por su misión en Talos IV.

action.name: Esta no es la única vida disponible

crew_archetypes.name: Pike de Boreth
crew_archetypes.flavor: En busca de una fuente de energía para el traje del Ángel Rojo, Pike busca respuestas en Boreth.

crew_archetypes.name: Enterprise Pike
crew_archetypes.flavor: Pike resumes his tenure as Captain of the Enterprise, despite knowing where his career will lead him

action.name: The Future Is What We Make It

crew_archetypes.name: Kiley Pike
crew_archetypes.flavor: Pike goes undercover on Kiley 279 to avert a nuclear conflict that should never have been made possible in the first place

crew_archetypes.name: Chef Pike
crew_archetypes.flavor: Intelligent, charismatic, handsome, and now he cooks?!! Is there anything Pike can’t do!?

action.name: Sometimes Things Go So Badly, You Just Have to Laugh

crew_archetypes.name: Amand Rauth Pike
crew_archetypes.flavor: Amand Rauth’s deferential demeanor was a thin veil for a truly treacherous nature that even Captain Pike’s charisma couldn’t hide.

crew_archetypes.name: Admiral Pike
crew_archetypes.flavor: Pike ends up in an alternate timeline where he escaped injury and became an admiral. But is it worth the sacrifices of millions of people and his loved ones?

crew_archetypes.name: Kalar Pike
crew_archetypes.flavor: Arriving on Kalar, Pike and his landing party discover that they are losing their memories.

action.name: I Need Our Memories To Come Back

crew_archetypes.name: Orion Hurricane Pike
crew_archetypes.flavor: Pike realizes his birthday might be better spent with friends and decides to enjoy his own surprise party.

action.name: Maybe I Should Celebrate With My Friends

crew_archetypes.name: Subspace Rhapsody Pike
crew_archetypes.flavor: Stuck to an improbability field, Pike and his crew find themselves in a musical reality where heightened emotions make them break into song.

crew_archetypes.name: Mirror Pike
crew_archetypes.flavor: Intent on being more than just a pretty face, Pike proved himself just as brutal as any other mirror denizen, including in how he took command of the ISS Enterprise.

crew_archetypes.name: Indomitable Pike
crew_archetypes.flavor: Pike finds himself trapped in Talosian illusions. He manages to find a way out - the Talosians are powerless in the face of unpredictability and emotionality.

action.name: There's A Way Out Of Any Cage, And I'll Find It!

crew_archetypes.name: Primer maje Haron
crew_archetypes.flavor: Haron, líder de la secta kazon relora, murió cuando maje Culluh lo transportó al espacio.

action.name: Qué criaturas más pequeñas y frágiles

crew_archetypes.name: Krem
crew_archetypes.flavor: Krem is not the smartest of the pirate crew, and his Ferengi lobes don’t help when it comes to Archer's manipulation tactics.

action.name: I Don't The Have Lobes For Business

crew_archetypes.name: Six of Ten
crew_archetypes.flavor: A Klingon flagship officer who, after becoming a Borg drone, collaborated with Voyager and became part of the movement against the Collective.

action.name: Their Sacrifice Will Not Be Forgotten

crew_archetypes.name: Rumpelstiltskin
crew_archetypes.flavor: Fairy-tale character who appeared on the ship to observe the unique phenomenon of imagination.

crew_archetypes.name: Mike Burnham Sr.
crew_archetypes.flavor: Mike, un agente encubierto que se hace pasar por un xenoantropólogo, siempre está listo para proteger a su familia.

action.name: No se lo conté a nadie

crew_archetypes.name: Disorderly Icheb
crew_archetypes.flavor: Icheb takes a stand against Seven’s methods of assimilating the recovered Borg children into civilian life.

crew_archetypes.name: Keyla Terrana
crew_archetypes.flavor: Keyla era una tandarana disfrazada de otra especie con motivaciones poco claras que intentó acercarse a Archer e interrogarlo sobre el Cabal.

crew_archetypes.name: Admiral Shelby
crew_archetypes.flavor: The once ambitious commander, now fleet admiral, spoke of Starfleet’s past and future on Frontier Day.

crew_archetypes.name: Anciano vedala
crew_archetypes.flavor: Llevó a cabo la expedición para recuperar el Alma de Alar robada e impedir que los skorr empezaran una guerra santa.

crew_archetypes.name: Assimilated Rooney
crew_archetypes.flavor: Researcher of the Arctic Archaeological Group. Was assimilated by the Borg and became a Borg drone.

crew_archetypes.name: Alférez Mendon
crew_archetypes.flavor: Mendon, un benzita, fue clave a la hora de evitar que una bacteria subatómica destruyera el Enterprise.

crew_archetypes.name: Crell Moset
crew_archetypes.flavor: Revivido como una simulación llamada «Programa de Consulta Médico Beta Uno», Moset era un científico brillante y de moral relajada.

crew_archetypes.name: Capitán gorn
crew_archetypes.flavor: Los metrones obligaron al capitán gorn, líder del ataque contra Cestus III, a que luchara contra Kirk.

crew_archetypes.name: EV Suit Gorn
crew_archetypes.flavor: A hostile Gorn immediately attacks Spock, who has boarded the Cayuga ship.

crew_archetypes.name: Angela Martine
crew_archetypes.flavor: Martine, tripulante a cargo de los fáser, perdió a su prometido de un modo trágico a bordo del Enterprise.

action.name: Todas las armas energizadas al máximo

crew_archetypes.name: Captain Vadic
crew_archetypes.flavor: Vadic and her team not only managed to escape from the trap, but also captured the Titan, getting even closer to their goal of capturing Jack Crusher.

crew_archetypes.name: Vadic
crew_archetypes.flavor: Hungry for revenge against the Federation for the torment they inflicted on her and the other Changelings, she helps a mysterious entity hunt for Jack Crusher.

action.name: How Very Precise With Your Timing

crew_archetypes.name: Morphing Vadic
crew_archetypes.flavor: The scientist who experimented on Vadic met a gruesome end, their form becoming a vessel for her vengeance.

action.name: You Gave Me The Ability To Mimic Your Blood
A la sociedad le vendría bien un poco de caos

crew_archetypes.name: B.G. Robinson
crew_archetypes.flavor: Un jefe de transportadores del Enterprise-D que no tardó en llamar la atención del capitán Okona.

action.name: Aguantaremos un poco más en un tiroteo

crew_archetypes.name: Crusher de incógnito
crew_archetypes.flavor: Como oficial jefe médico del Enterprise, la doctora Crusher participó en el asalto a Celtris III.

crew_archetypes.name: Crusher de la era de la navegación a vela
Beverly Crusher con uniforme de gala
Crusher de Mok'bara
crew_archetypes.flavor: Beverly practica el arte klingon del Mok'bara para meditar y también para husmear en la vida amorosa de Troi.

crew_archetypes.name: Crusher de Caldos IV
crew_archetypes.flavor: Beverly Crusher se encuentra con una forma de vida anafásica ligada a una reliquia familiar.

crew_archetypes.name: Crusher enfermera del siglo XIX
crew_archetypes.flavor: Crusher viaja al siglo XIX para salvar al comandante Data de las formas de vida devidianas y se hace pasar por una enfermera.

crew_archetypes.name: Battle Beverly Crusher
crew_archetypes.flavor: Without hesitation, Crusher opens fire on the masked bounty hunters that have infiltrated the SS Eleos XII to protect her son.

crew_archetypes.name: Brain Drain Crusher and Riker
crew_archetypes.flavor: Blood-curdling nightmare: Crusher, with a straight face, drinks 'something' from a straw that sticks out of Riker's head. It's just a dream, just a dream...

action.name: Do You Want Some? It's Delicious.

crew_archetypes.name: Stretching Crusher
crew_archetypes.flavor: During training, Crusher is happy to not only listen to Troi about her romantic experiences, but also support and give advice.

action.name: Who Needs Rational When Your Toes Curl Up?

crew_archetypes.name: Bridge Beverly Crusher
crew_archetypes.flavor: Beverly's skills were put to the test, but she managed to locate her son within the din of the Collective.

crew_archetypes.name: Idrin
crew_archetypes.flavor: Idrin, comandante de una nave de caza hirogen, capturó a Tuvok y a Siete de Nueve.

crew_archetypes.name: Captain Rayner
crew_archetypes.flavor: The Captain of the USS Antares has a gruff manner, but it is the way his history with Moll and L’ak clouds his judgment that worries Burnham.

action.name: I See You Started Without Me

crew_archetypes.name: Gathorel Labin
crew_archetypes.flavor: A Sikarian magistrate who revels at the chance to host a “ship of aliens” and gain as much pleasure from their tales as his people can.

action.name: My Pleasure Will Be Greater Than Yours
Ver más allá de los números

crew_archetypes.name: Ephraim y Dot
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ephraim y Dot, que en un principio estaban enfrentados, se ayudaron mutuamente para escapar de una situación desesperada y se convirtieron en amigos improbables.

crew_archetypes.name: Capitán Morgan Bateson
crew_archetypes.flavor: Morgan Bateson, capitán del U.S.S. Bozeman, se quedó atrapado en un bucle temporal durante casi 80 años.

crew_archetypes.name: Gaila
crew_archetypes.flavor: Thanks to Quark, his fortunes faded, but that doesn't deter him from joining a mission to rescue Ishka, even if it's under a dubious promise for riches.

action.name: I'm A Weapons Dealer, Not A Soldier!

crew_archetypes.name: Gary Seven
crew_archetypes.flavor: Gary Seven, supervisor de primera clase, pasó su vida en un mundo extraterrestre preparándose para el día en que regresaría a salvar la Tierra.

crew_archetypes.name: Alandra La Forge
crew_archetypes.flavor: The spitting image of her father, Alandra follows in his footsteps, joining Starfleet and helping to maintain the Fleet Museum.

crew_archetypes.name: Tallinn
crew_archetypes.flavor: As one of the mysterious Supervisors, Tallinn watched over and protected Renée Picard throughout the 21st century.

action.name: A Leap of Faith? It's Kind Of How I Roll

crew_archetypes.name: Chakotay de la SGM
crew_archetypes.flavor: Mientras el Voyager estaba bajo el control de los hirogen, Chakotay fue obligado a servir como capitán de un ejército.

crew_archetypes.name: Chakotay de la Unión
crew_archetypes.flavor: Disfrazado de oficial de la Unión, Chakotay dirige el rescate para salvar a Q y a Janeway.

crew_archetypes.name: Chakotay Amal
crew_archetypes.flavor: Chakotay se disfraza de Amal para infiltrarse en el campo de trabajo quarren y rescatar a la tripulación del Voyager a la que han lavado el cerebro.

action.name: Deje que le demuestre quién soy

crew_archetypes.name: Chakotay caminante de los sueños
crew_archetypes.flavor: Chakotay, que es capaz de tener sueños lúcidos, se adentra en su mente inconsciente para descubrir lo que le ocurre a la tripulación que no puede despertar.

action.name: Sé que esto es un sueño

crew_archetypes.name: Chakotay defensor de los vori
crew_archetypes.flavor: Chakotay lucha junto a los vori como defensor contra los kradin, sin ser consciente de que forma parte de un programa de adoctrinamiento.

crew_archetypes.name: Luau Chakotay
crew_archetypes.flavor: Chakotay is having a great time and resting up at the luau, not yet knowing what lies ahead.

crew_archetypes.name: Timeless Chakotay
crew_archetypes.flavor: Chakotay, along with Kim, are the only survivors of Voyager's collision with the ice planet. After 15 years, they return to the ship to correct mistakes and save the crew.

crew_archetypes.name: Homesteader Chakotay
crew_archetypes.flavor: Infected with an incurable disease, Chakotay and Janeway are placed on an unknown planet while a cure is sought.

crew_archetypes.name: Kol de la casa de Kor
K'Ehleyr klingon
crew_archetypes.flavor: A punto de embarcarse en una misión para rehabilitar a los klingon de una época de guerra, K'Ehleyr le profesa sus sentimientos a Worf.

crew_archetypes.name: Tercero Remata'Klan
crew_archetypes.flavor: Tercer Jem'Hadar, siguió con lealtad las órdenes de Keevan, aunque eso le supusiera la muerte.

crew_archetypes.name: Captain Clark Terrell
crew_archetypes.flavor: The captain of the USS Reliant. His mind was overtaken by Khan but with a loyalty so strong he took his own life to protect Kirk’s.

action.name: What Do You Want With Us?
El cuerpo no es más que una máquina...

crew_archetypes.name: Jett Reno nerviosa
crew_archetypes.flavor: Confundida con visiones del futuro, una nerviosa Jett Reno corre a entregar el cristal del tiempo.

crew_archetypes.name: Temporarily Detained Jett Reno
crew_archetypes.flavor: Bored while she’s trapped on Book’s ship, Reno plays with her food and uses some black licorice to power a communicator to call for help.

action.name: I Have Something That Can Help

crew_archetypes.name: Agentes Dulmur y Lucsly
crew_archetypes.flavor: Dulmur y Lucsly se ven envueltos en una seria investigación acerca del tiempo que pasó Sisko en el Enterprise de Kirk.

crew_archetypes.name: T'Les
crew_archetypes.flavor: T’Les’ life becomes increasingly complicated as a result of T’Pol’s time aboard the Enterprise and her actions at P’Jem, even seeing her forced out of the Vulcan Science Academy.

action.name: There's More To Life Than One's Profession
Lo que soy hoy lo seré siempre

crew_archetypes.name: Kago-Darr
crew_archetypes.flavor: A desperate bounty hunter who, in order to capture Archer for a reward, attacked his longtime rival, but was ultimately defeated.

crew_archetypes.name: Intendente Kira del espejo
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kira, intendente del sector bajorano de la Alianza Klingon-Cardasiana, fue capturada por la rebelión terrana.

crew_archetypes.name: Kira disfrazada
crew_archetypes.flavor: Camuflada como una prisionera bajorana, Kira se coló en un campo de trabajos forzados cardasiano y rescató al líder de la Resistencia Li Nalas.

crew_archetypes.name: Kira cardasiana
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kira fue secuestrada y modificada por la Orden Obsidiana en una conspiración que pretendía destapar a Tekeny Ghemor.

action.name: Lo más parecido a una familia

crew_archetypes.name: Kira Nerys Niners
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kira se incorporó al equipo de baseball de Sisko como «shortstop» en los Niners contra los Lógicos vulcanos.

crew_archetypes.name: Anastasia Komananov
crew_archetypes.flavor: Después de un accidente con el transportador, un programa de holosala utiliza la imagen de Kira para mostrar a una agente secreta soviética.

crew_archetypes.name: Comandante Kira Nerys
crew_archetypes.flavor: Para facilitar el contacto con los rebeldes cardasianos, a Kira se le dio un ascenso de campo en la Flota Estelar.

crew_archetypes.name: Kira disfrazada de breen
crew_archetypes.flavor: Una Kira disfrazada ayuda a Dukat a entrar en razón antes de que su hija salga perjudicada.

crew_archetypes.name: Kira Luma Rahl
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kira viaja atrás en el tiempo y se hace pasar por una dama de compañía para averiguar la verdad acerca de los últimos años de su madre.

crew_archetypes.name: Profeta Kira
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kira habría estado dispuesta a entregarse a los profetas sin importar las consecuencias, aunque eso significara su muerte.

crew_archetypes.name: Hippie Kira
crew_archetypes.flavor: While trying to find Sisko, Kira, along with O’Brien, ends up in the late 1960s, where they encounter a pair of hippies.

crew_archetypes.name: Surrogate Kira
crew_archetypes.flavor: Life aboard Deep Space Nine can be hectic, but nothing can stop Kira, even when she's carrying a baby for the O'Briens.

action.name: Sometimes Innocence is Just an Excuse for the Guilty

crew_archetypes.name: Lela Kira
crew_archetypes.flavor: Lela was Dax's first host and one of the first women to serve as a council member. Kira did not hesitate to host such a remarkable figure.

action.name: What is a Person, But The Sum of Their Memories?

crew_archetypes.name: Colonel Kira Nerys
crew_archetypes.flavor: Nerys keeps things running on Deep Space Nine, with a few curveballs from Quark every now and then.

crew_archetypes.name: Peldor Joi Kira
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kira puts on a short but spectacular fire show - and the Bajoran Gratitude Festival begins!

crew_archetypes.name: Changeling Kira
crew_archetypes.flavor: A Female Changeling in the guise of Kira lures Odo to a deserted moon to find out why he chooses to live among the 'solids' - and how she can change his mind.

action.name: Get The Hell Off This Moon!

crew_archetypes.name: Pav líder
crew_archetypes.flavor: Pav, líder del gobierno trill, dudaba de la unión de Adira con Tal.

crew_archetypes.name: Gul Madred
crew_archetypes.flavor: Gul Madred, interrogador cardasiano, era el encargado de sonsacarle al capitán Picard la estrategia de defensa de Minos Korva.

crew_archetypes.name: John Frederick Paxton
crew_archetypes.flavor: Paxton, líder de la xenófoba Terra Prime, convirtió el complejo minero Orpheus en un arma para poder expulsar a todos los alienígenas del sistema Sol.

action.name: Un baño de sangre es lo que tendrá

crew_archetypes.name: La'an Noonien Singh
crew_archetypes.flavor: La'an Noonien Singh was the chief of security on the USS Enterprise. She endeavored to keep the shadows of her past locked away.

action.name: Not Believing You're Gonna Die Is What Gets You Killed

crew_archetypes.name: First Monarch Kaitaama
crew_archetypes.flavor: Rescued from her abductors by Tucker, Kaitaama finds herself in a tense survival situation very different from her plush royal lifestyle.

action.name: Is Your Entire Species So Ill Mannered?
La verdad no saldrá a la luz

crew_archetypes.name: Enfermero Paris
crew_archetypes.flavor: Controlador de vuelo del USS Voyager, le persiguió su pasado con los maquis y en el USS Exeter.

crew_archetypes.name: Paris de Capitán Protón
crew_archetypes.flavor: Tom Paris solía adoptar su papel de héroe en «Las aventuras del capitán Protón» en la holocubierta.

action.name: Por un instante estuve en todas partes

crew_archetypes.name: Maquis amotinado Paris
crew_archetypes.flavor: París vuelve a su identidad de maquis para salvar el Voyager de un holoprograma que Seska ha saboteado.

crew_archetypes.name: Paris de luau
crew_archetypes.flavor: Paris se pone su clásica camisa surfera de Big Daddy-O para asistir a un luau con sus compañeros.

crew_archetypes.name: Disguised Tom Paris
crew_archetypes.flavor: An aficionado of all things 20th century, Tom Paris still struggled to fit in amid people on Earth in 1996.

action.name: Is It So Unusual To Care About Something More?

crew_archetypes.name: Esteemed Tom Paris
crew_archetypes.flavor: It’s not every day an esteemed member of the ‘Voy’ visits the USS Cerritos, but when one does, Boimler is there to drool all over him.

action.name: This Is How we kick A## In The Delta Quadrant

crew_archetypes.name: Prisoner Paris
crew_archetypes.flavor: While serving time for working with the Maquis, Tom Paris was recruited by Janeway to locate the Val Jean in exchange for his freedom.

action.name: I'm Already Doing a Job For The Federation

crew_archetypes.name: Machine Man Paris
crew_archetypes.flavor: Fascinated by the study of an alien shuttle that he names Alice, Paris fails to realize he is falling into the vessel’s cunning and dangerous trap.

action.name: Argh! What Are You Doing To Me?

crew_archetypes.name: Facepalm Paris
crew_archetypes.flavor: An exhausted and frustrated Tom Paris has his head in his hands after a tumultuous time on the holodeck.

action.name: Thinking And Thinking. Trying Not To Think.

crew_archetypes.name: Lieutenant Marseilles
crew_archetypes.flavor: The Doctor's holonovel character based on Tom Paris - similar in appearance, but narcissistic and cruel in character.

action.name: Didn't I Tell You To Go To Engineering?

crew_archetypes.name: Morn
crew_archetypes.flavor: Un dicharachero cliente habitual del bar de Quark, Morn a menudo disfrutaba de una copa en su taburete de la barra.

crew_archetypes.name: Mourned Morn
crew_archetypes.flavor: Morn faked his own death to avoid his associates’ attempts to steal his bequest. For once, silence pervades the bar at Quark’s.

crew_archetypes.name: Dr. Tolian Soran
crew_archetypes.flavor: Soran, superviviente de la destrucción borg de El-Auria, estaba obsesionado con regresar al Nexus.

crew_archetypes.name: Dr. David Marcus
crew_archetypes.flavor: Hijo del almirante Kirk y la doctora Carol Marcus, David murió en el planeta Génesis cuando rescató a la teniente Saavik de la muerte.

action.name: No es el arma, es el soldado

crew_archetypes.name: Ensign Mesk
crew_archetypes.flavor: Mesk had never been to Orion, but lied about being the son of Orion pirates. Quite successfully until his pirate skills were needed during a mission.

action.name: Everything I Know About Orions I Learned From The Holonovels

crew_archetypes.name: Spy Rumdar
crew_archetypes.flavor: This Pakled spy cannot really tell the difference between the Cerritos and the Enterprise, or between the bathroom and an airlock.

crew_archetypes.name: Doctor con emisor
crew_archetypes.flavor: Este HME, equipado con un holoemisor del siglo XXIX, tenía total libertad de movimiento.

crew_archetypes.name: Holograma médico de emergencia modelo 1
crew_archetypes.flavor: El HME del Voyager, la primera versión del programa HME de uso comercial, es el único que se sigue usando con fines médicos.

action.name: ¿Los nueve de vuelta de Gedi Prime?

crew_archetypes.name: HME Beowulf
crew_archetypes.flavor: Por su naturaleza, el doctor fue el único capaz de rescatar a la tripulación del holoprograma Beowulf. Fue su primera misión fuera de casa.

crew_archetypes.name: Kenneth EMH
crew_archetypes.flavor: The Doctor explores nuclear family life by spending time with a holographic family of his own creation.

action.name: The Coffee Was Quite Good This Morning

crew_archetypes.name: Emony Leeta
crew_archetypes.flavor: As an amateur sociologist, Leeta was happy to take part in the zhian'tara ritual. She helped Emony relive her gymnastics career for a while.

crew_archetypes.name: Rites of Separation Leeta
crew_archetypes.flavor: While vacationing on Risa, Leeta and Bashir amicably end their relationship with the ancient Bajoran Rite of Separation.

crew_archetypes.name: First Clerk Leeta
crew_archetypes.flavor: Though her title is First Clerk, Leeta may be wielding more power than her position suggests. …or is she?

action.name: Also, The Nagus Would Like You To Dance For Him

crew_archetypes.name: Dak'Rah
crew_archetypes.flavor: Dak’Rah wanted to correct the mistakes of his past and became an ambassador to the Federation, but the past still followed him like a shadow.

action.name: But I've Been Doing The Best I Can
¡Todo lo que he dicho es la verdad!

crew_archetypes.name: Renegade Locarno
crew_archetypes.flavor: Locarno’s resentment for Starfleet grew so intense that he decided to organize his own rebel fleet.

action.name: I Could've Been The Best Pilot in Starfleet!

crew_archetypes.name: Captain Diatta Ndoye
crew_archetypes.flavor: As a captain in the United Earth Force, Ndoye seems reluctant on diplomacy and more inclined to fire torpedoes. Maybe Saru will teach her a valuable lesson.

action.name: Ya hemos rebasado un poco el punto de preocuparnos

crew_archetypes.name: Juez Q
crew_archetypes.flavor: Juez y jurado todopoderoso, Q puso a prueba a la tripulación del Enterprise-D en Farpoint.

crew_archetypes.name: Q humano
crew_archetypes.flavor: Después de que el Continuo Q le arrebatara sus poderes, Q buscó refugio en el Enterprise-D.

crew_archetypes.name: Q sheriff de Nottingham
crew_archetypes.flavor: Durante la simulación de Robin Hood, Q interpretó el papel de sheriff de Nottingham.

crew_archetypes.name: Q don juan
crew_archetypes.flavor: De todas las hembras, de todas las especies de toda la galaxia... Q se deja caer para informar a Janeway de sus planes de ser padre.

crew_archetypes.name: Q arqueólogo
crew_archetypes.flavor: Q tienta a Picard con viajes a civilizaciones antiguas para entender mejor la historia y la arqueología.

crew_archetypes.name: Luau Q
crew_archetypes.flavor: In the Delta Quadrant, Q searches for long lost knowledge - romantic advice from Kim and Paris.

crew_archetypes.name: Q de la Unión
crew_archetypes.flavor: Q se lleva a Janeway al Continuo Q donde se recrea la guerra de Secesión e intenta explicarle por qué el continuo está guerra consigo mismo.

crew_archetypes.name: Q del siglo XXV
crew_archetypes.flavor: Q le hace una visita inesperada a Picard que lleva a este por un nuevo camino.

crew_archetypes.name: Dread Pirate Q
crew_archetypes.flavor: Q would be a tough pirate, wouldn't he? He’s had an eternity to build up an immunity to poisonous powders.

crew_archetypes.name: Chokuzan Q
crew_archetypes.flavor: After his son leaves Voyager for a joyride, Q takes on the guise of a Chokuzan to test Q Jr.

action.name: Well Done, Junior. I'm Proud Of You.

crew_archetypes.name: Tabor
crew_archetypes.flavor: A former Maquis, Tabor joined the Voyager crew. He struggled with memories of the Cardassian scientist's horrific experiments on his family.

action.name: I Promised Myself I Would Never Forget

crew_archetypes.name: Dr. Reyga
crew_archetypes.flavor: El doctor Reyga era científico ferengi brillante, y como tal inventó el escudo metafásico antes de su muerte.

crew_archetypes.name: Fascination Lwaxana Troi
crew_archetypes.flavor: Lwaxana’s mere presence at the Bajoran Gratitude Festival was enough for everyone around her to begin to open up about their secret feelings.

action.name: I Came To See You, You Poor Sweet Tortured Man

crew_archetypes.name: Bionic 5 Rutherford
crew_archetypes.flavor: Rutherford is cast in Mariner’s holonovel “Crisis Point” as Vindicta’s cyborg henchman, Bionic 5.

action.name: Tremble At The Sight Of The Great Vindicta!

crew_archetypes.name: Ensign Rutherford
crew_archetypes.flavor: Rutherford loves being an engineer, and spends his free time talking about how great the Cerritos is with Tendi.

crew_archetypes.name: EV Suit Rutherford
crew_archetypes.flavor: Rutherford uses his custom holodeck program to help Tendi learn how to spacewalk. Lessons were learned.

crew_archetypes.name: Chief Engineer Rutherford
crew_archetypes.flavor: During a drill, Rutherford’s attempt at an iconic heroic sacrifice is foiled by the mundane reality of pain.

action.name: I Have To, Son. I Am Chief Engineer.

crew_archetypes.name: Cadet Rutherford
crew_archetypes.flavor: Rutherford wasn’t always so earnest. As a cadet, he broke rules and caused chaos. But could there be a sinister cause behind his change?

crew_archetypes.name: Anbo-jyutsu Rutherford
crew_archetypes.flavor: Secret training with Boimler does not produce any results - they still lose in a two-on-one match with Mariner. Again.

action.name: Hopefully We Picked Up A Few Of Your Moves

crew_archetypes.name: Dragon's Breath Rutherford
crew_archetypes.flavor: The Hysperians would certainly be delighted if the talented Rutherford was one of them. How does this armor suit him!

crew_archetypes.name: Sócrates
crew_archetypes.flavor: Una parte del programa de enriquecimiento de la personalidad del holoprograma médico de emergencia que produjo resultados no deseados.

action.name: Solo sé que no sé nada

crew_archetypes.name: Perrin
crew_archetypes.flavor: Sarek's last wife. She was devoted to him and loved him, and did not doubt his love. She did her best to protect him during his illness.

action.name: I Know. I Have Always Known.

crew_archetypes.name: Mark and Mollie
crew_archetypes.flavor: Janeway leaves for Voyager, but her fiancé Mark still has an equally important mission - to look after her dog Mollie.

action.name: Is This Another 'Love Me, Love My Dog' Demand?
El proyecto Voyager no ha hecho más que empezar

crew_archetypes.name: Barclay conectado
crew_archetypes.flavor: Barclay, mejorado por los citerianos, creó una interfaz neural neural para el ordenador del Enterprise.

crew_archetypes.name: Cyrano de Barclay
crew_archetypes.flavor: Para superar su adicción a la holocubierta, Barclay adopta el papel de Cyrano de Bergerac ante sus compañeros.

action.name: La Luna... Sí, ese será mi hogar

crew_archetypes.name: Barclay del primer contacto
crew_archetypes.flavor: Barclay está encantado de poder conocer al mismísimo inventor del motor de curvatura, Zefram Cochrane.

crew_archetypes.name: Barclay and Neelix
crew_archetypes.flavor: On temporary leave, Lieutenant Barclay returns to his apartment on Earth to spend time with his cat Neelix.

action.name: Sorry, He’s Not Used To Company

crew_archetypes.name: Captain Vasso L'Gaelia
crew_archetypes.flavor: During negotiations for a potential alliance, Captain Vasso left the Federation delegates baffled by his R’ongovian radical empathy.

action.name: Tan real como quieras que sea

crew_archetypes.name: Embajador Sarek
crew_archetypes.flavor: Embajador de Vulcano y padre de Spock.

crew_archetypes.name: Sarek dignatario
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ocultando su afección cardíaca, Sarek aguanta el tipo frente a un telarita particularmente tenaz.

crew_archetypes.name: Legaran Delegate Sarek
crew_archetypes.flavor: In spite of Bendii Syndrome weakening his emotional control, Sarek is able to complete negotiations with the Legarans thanks to Picard’s help.

crew_archetypes.name: Concerned Father Sarek
crew_archetypes.flavor: After finding Spock's katra, Sarek threw all his strength into getting his son back, not guided by logic at all.

action.name: My Logic Is Uncertain Where My Son Is Concerned

crew_archetypes.name: Captain Shaw
crew_archetypes.flavor: Commander of the USS Titan-A, described by Riker as 'not a friendly face'  when he brought Picard and Riker aboard.

action.name: I'm Much More of a Malbec Man

crew_archetypes.name: Heroic Shaw
crew_archetypes.flavor: Once again faced with a Borg threat, Shaw sacrifices his life for his crew - even those he was most critical of.

crew_archetypes.name: Jhamel
crew_archetypes.flavor: Jhamel, de la subespecie aenar, utilizó su telepatía para encontrar a su hermano y ponerse en contacto con él mediante una unidad de telepresencia.

crew_archetypes.name: Booker y Saña
crew_archetypes.flavor: Booker es un mensajero que lleva a cabo encargos y hace contrabando de bienes para conseguir el dilitio necesario para sobrevivir con su reina, Saña.

action.name: Nunca he estado en la Tierra

crew_archetypes.name: Sanctuary Booker
crew_archetypes.flavor: Booker volvió a su planeta natal, Kwejian, para salvarlo de la amenaza de Osyraa.

crew_archetypes.name: Breakthrough Booker
crew_archetypes.flavor: Booker cautions that pain isn’t how loved ones should be honored, and the 10-C understand. Their empathetic breakthrough halts the DMA.

action.name: That Is The Start of Making Things Right

crew_archetypes.name: Ikhu Zhen Booker
crew_archetypes.flavor: According to Kwejian tradition, Booker performed the Ikhu Zhen ceremony for his nephew Leto, when a boy becomes a man.

action.name: A Boy Only Becomes A Man Once

crew_archetypes.name: Q'Mau Booker
crew_archetypes.flavor: The landing on Q'Mau was especially important for Booker - here he had the opportunity to finally talk openly with Burnham after a long break

action.name: The Further I Am From This, The Better

crew_archetypes.name: Sonda Ilia
crew_archetypes.flavor: Originally a crew member of the Enterprise-A, Ilia was destroyed and recreated as a probe by the entity V'Ger.

crew_archetypes.name: Hugh
crew_archetypes.flavor: Tras sobrevivir a un accidente de un cubo explorador borg, 3 de 5 empezó a mostrar signos de individualidad y se convirtió en Hugh.

crew_archetypes.name: Director ejecutivo Hugh
crew_archetypes.flavor: Un antiguo dron borg, Hugh se convirtió en el director ejecutivo del proyecto de recuperación borg.

crew_archetypes.name: Gilora Rejal
crew_archetypes.flavor: Como miembro del Ministerio de Ciencia cardasiano, Gilora Rejal ayudó a diseñar un relé subespacial en el cuadrante Gamma.

crew_archetypes.name: J'Vini
crew_archetypes.flavor: For a Qalankhkai, an oath is an unbreakable promise until it is fulfilled. Not even Starfleet officers can stop J'Vini in her mission.

action.name: Come After Me And Your Lives Are Forfeit

crew_archetypes.name: Alférez Ro
crew_archetypes.flavor: Una obstinada y orgullosa bajorana, Ro Laren ayudó al capitán Picard y a su tripulación a seguir el rastro de un grupo de terroristas.

crew_archetypes.name: Ro Laren maquis
crew_archetypes.flavor: Enviada para infiltrarse en una célula maquis, Ro Laren se unió en cambio a la lucha contra los cardasianos.

action.name: No sé muy bien qué pensar

crew_archetypes.name: Insider Ro
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ro was recruited by Starfleet Intelligence, where she underwent intensive rehabilitation.

action.name: Blind Faith In Any Institution Does Not Make One Honorable

crew_archetypes.name: Khan iracundo
crew_archetypes.flavor: Khan, exiliado por Kirk al maltrecho planeta Ceti Alfa V, juró vengarse del supuesto abandono del almirante Kirk.

crew_archetypes.name: Khan joven
crew_archetypes.flavor: Khan, gobernante de un cuarto de la población humana durante las Guerras Eugenésicas, huyó de la Tierra en la S.S. Botany Bay.

crew_archetypes.name: Khan con uniforme de la Flota Estelar
Ceti Alpha V Khan
crew_archetypes.flavor: On Ceti Alpha V, Khan did everything to keep his people alive. With the raise of a hand, he immediately has his peoples’ ears - and their trust.

action.name: I Was a Prince... With Power Over Millions.

crew_archetypes.name: Michael Jonas
crew_archetypes.flavor: A Maquis crew member who betrayed the combined crew of the Voyager to Seska and the Kazon.

action.name: She Knows That I Can Be Trusted

crew_archetypes.name: Gray
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ahora parte de Adira, Gray le apoya sin ser visto.

crew_archetypes.name: Second Chance Gray
crew_archetypes.flavor: Gray now has a new synthetic body of his own to finally interact with the Discovery crew.

crew_archetypes.name: Guardian Gray
crew_archetypes.flavor: After six months of separation, Gray appears as a Guardian at the ceremony of transferring the symbiont into Culber's body.

crew_archetypes.name: Archer del espejo
crew_archetypes.flavor: Archer, el primer oficial del I.S.S Enterprise del siglo XXII, robó el U.S.S. Defiant de los tholianos.

action.name: La suerte no tuvo nada que ver

crew_archetypes.name: Archer y Porthos de acampada
crew_archetypes.flavor: Archer se lleva a Porthos en una misión de investigación a un planeta de clase M que más tarde sería conocido como Archer IV.

action.name: Ir adonde ningún perro ha ido nunca

crew_archetypes.name: Twilight Archer
crew_archetypes.flavor: The anterograde amnesia from a parasitic infection leaves him confused and unable to serve as captain.

crew_archetypes.name: Carpenter Street Archer
crew_archetypes.flavor: Archer and T’Pol end up in 2004 Detroit and must stop the Xindi Reptilians.

action.name: Try to Stay Out of Trouble

crew_archetypes.name: Federation President Archer
crew_archetypes.flavor: After years of service in Starfleet and the Federation Council, Archer was elected President of the Federation, a post he held for 8 years.

crew_archetypes.name: First Flight Archer
crew_archetypes.flavor: Archer steals the NX-Beta, intent on proving the capability of his father’s warp engine and ensuring the NX Project proceeds.

action.name: Sherlock Holmes Has Nothing On You

crew_archetypes.name: Zero Hour Archer
crew_archetypes.flavor: Archer defeats Dolim and blows up the reactor to destroy the Xindi Superweapon once and for all.

crew_archetypes.name: Water Polo Archer
crew_archetypes.flavor: An avid fan of water polo, having made it all the way to North American regionals, Archer still keeps a memento in the form of a ball in his cabin.

action.name: One Part Basketball, One Part Swimming, One Part Wrestling

crew_archetypes.name: Surak Archer
crew_archetypes.flavor: While Archer’s carrying Surak’s katra, the father of Vulcan logic has much to share with him.

action.name: I Felt Something Inside... My Head

crew_archetypes.name: A.G. Robinson
crew_archetypes.flavor: El primer ser humano que rompió la curvatura 2 y sobrevivió a la expulsión en una cápsula de escape. Destruyó uno de dos prototipos de NX, casi poniendo fin al proyecto NX.

crew_archetypes.name: Toral, Son of Duras
crew_archetypes.flavor: After the death of his aunts, Toral attempts to take over the Klingon Empire alone.

action.name: What We All Want. The Sword.

crew_archetypes.name: Paul Mayweather
crew_archetypes.flavor: Though he resented Travis for leaving, Paul was able to fill his father’s shoes as captain thanks to some help from his brother.

action.name: You Do Remember How To Fly This Ship?

crew_archetypes.name: Grady
crew_archetypes.flavor: A mentally ill homeless man, he was convinced that aliens were visiting the Earth and that he could be invisible.

crew_archetypes.name: Prime Minister Nayrok
crew_archetypes.flavor: Angosian Prime Minister whose attempt to join the Federation was halted not only by rebellion, but also by Nayrok's unwillingness to be open.

crew_archetypes.name: Tte. Tasha Yar
crew_archetypes.flavor: Jefa de seguridad del USS Enterprise-D. Murió en acción a manos de una forma de vida alienígena.

crew_archetypes.name: Yar de nave de guerra
crew_archetypes.flavor: Refugiada en un universo alternativo en que el Enterprise-C se enfrentaba a diario contra el Imperio klingon.

crew_archetypes.name: Yar del WASP
crew_archetypes.flavor: Inspirada en las aventuras en la holocubierta de O'Brien y Bashir, Yar aviadora hizo su aparición durante la Segunda Batalla de Nueva York.

crew_archetypes.name: Cocinero Neelix
crew_archetypes.flavor: Chef y levantador de ánimos en el USS Voyager, Neelix era tristemente célebre por su sustituto del café, que era «incluso mejor» que el de verdad.

action.name: La sopa está en la mesa
La sopa está en la mesa

crew_archetypes.name: Neelix humano
crew_archetypes.flavor: El metre no tuvo mucho éxito a la hora de hacer cumplir la rigurosa etiqueta cuando los borg persiguieron a Picard hasta su club nocturno.

crew_archetypes.name: Nightless Neelix
crew_archetypes.flavor: Neelix tries to keep a clear head and keep morale up among the crew, but his own anxiety and nihiliphobia begin to consume him.

crew_archetypes.name: Neelix EMH
crew_archetypes.flavor: Neelix enters ‘Photons Be Free’ as the EMH, where he is beleaguered by a heavy mobile holo emitter and subjected to horrific treatment.

action.name: I Don't Think These Subroutines Are Trivial, Captain

crew_archetypes.name: Scavenger Neelix
crew_archetypes.flavor: Neelix’s six years of experience on a Talaxian garbage scow, including almost dying when theta radiation disabled the ship, may be just what the Voyager crew needs.

crew_archetypes.name: Commodore Bochra
crew_archetypes.flavor: During a secret mission, Bochra's ship was wrecked. He was able to escape thanks to the Federation officer, which he despised so much.

action.name: No Wonder Your Race Is Weak

crew_archetypes.name: Sisko desplazado en el tiempo
crew_archetypes.flavor: Sisko, disfrazado como tripulante del primer U.S.S. Enterprise, trabajó para evitar el asesinato del capitán Kirk.

crew_archetypes.name: Sisko del espejo
crew_archetypes.flavor: Corsario que trabajó bajo el mando de la intendente Kira en el universo espejo y más tarde lideró la rebelión terrana contra la AKC.

crew_archetypes.name: Capitán Sisko
crew_archetypes.flavor: Sisko tenía la gran responsabilidad de gobernar el Espacio profundo nueve durante la Guerra del Dominio.

crew_archetypes.name: Sisko ascendido
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ascendido a capitán, Benjamin Sisko recibió reconocimiento por sus logros como comandante del Espacio profundo nueve.

crew_archetypes.name: Dr. Hipócrates Noah
crew_archetypes.flavor: Después de un accidente con el transportador, un programa de holosala utiliza la imagen de Sisko para mostrar al supervillano Hipócrates Noah.

action.name: El momento en que tomé la decisión

crew_archetypes.name: Ben Sisko del desierto
crew_archetypes.flavor: “Guiado por una visión de los profetas, Sisko recorre Tyree en busca del orbe del emisario."

action.name: Sé que está en algún sitio

crew_archetypes.name: Sisko de Kal'Hyah
crew_archetypes.flavor: As Dax struggles with Klingon tradition, Sisko reminds his old friend what she must do and why she is doing it.

crew_archetypes.name: Sisko, The Emissary
crew_archetypes.flavor: With the Pah-Wraiths sealed away, The Sisko ascended to the Celestial Temple with The Prophets to continue his work outside time.

crew_archetypes.name: Joran Sisko
crew_archetypes.flavor: Commander Sisko risks his safety to take on the memories of the murderous musician Joran.

action.name: Do You Think of Me When You Play?

crew_archetypes.name: Night Writing Benny Russell
crew_archetypes.flavor: Inspired after meeting a prophetic preacher, Benny Russell writes the story of Captain Sisko late into the night.

crew_archetypes.name: C.O.P. Sisko
crew_archetypes.flavor: With a perspective outside of linear time, The Sisko is ready to guide the future of the Federation in Archer’s stead.

action.name: You Win Some, You Lose Some

crew_archetypes.name: L'Rell madre
crew_archetypes.flavor: Llevó a cabo sacrificios por el bien de su hijo secreto y por el del Imperio klingon.

crew_archetypes.name: Crosis
crew_archetypes.flavor: An uncharacteristically individualistic Borg drone. Aboard the Enterprise, Crosis seeks to lure Data to Lore's side.

crew_archetypes.name: Ensign Arav
crew_archetypes.flavor: This Osnullus science officer has remained with the USS Discovery across time and space, through thick and thin

crew_archetypes.name: Tuvix
crew_archetypes.flavor: Creado en un accidente de un transportador, Tuvix acabó quedando dividido en Tuvok y Neelix.

crew_archetypes.name: Ixtana'Rax
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ixtana'Rax tried his best to prevent his commander from being tricked by the imprisoned Defiant crew, but he was completely ignored.

crew_archetypes.name: Dr. Richard Daystrom
crew_archetypes.flavor: El doctor Daystrom, uno de los mejores científicos de la Tierra, creó el ordenador M-5 para automatizar las operaciones de la nave estelar.

crew_archetypes.name: V'Las
crew_archetypes.flavor: Head of the Vulcan High Command, but ultimately a collaborator in a Romulan conspiracy where he intended to invade Andoria.

action.name: You've Failed. Decades of Work Have Been Lost.

crew_archetypes.name: Kivas Fajo
crew_archetypes.flavor: Coleccionista de objetos raros, extraños y a veces ilegales, Kivas Fajo fingió la muerte de Data para añadir al androide a su colección.

crew_archetypes.name: Soldado klingon Alexander
crew_archetypes.flavor: Se unió a la Rotarran como miembro de las Fuerzas de Defensa Klingon, en contra de los deseos de su padre.

crew_archetypes.name: Alexander tawi'yan
crew_archetypes.flavor: El cambio de destino de Alexander acelera los planes de boda de Jadzia y Worf y así él pueda acudir como tawi'yan de su padre (o escudero).

crew_archetypes.name: Infected Tryla Scott
crew_archetypes.flavor: Parasitic beings have infiltrated Starfleet. While Captain Scott is amongst the first to suspect something is wrong, she unfortunately becomes infected by the parasite in the end.

crew_archetypes.name: Counselor Neera Ketoul
crew_archetypes.flavor: Neera serves as Una’s lawyer in her court martial. Skeptical of Starfleet, she works to show the injustice done to Una - and all Illyrians.

action.name: I Am Not The Biggest Fan of Starfleet

crew_archetypes.name: Comandante Maddox
crew_archetypes.flavor: Cibernético de la Flota Estelar, Bruce Maddox intentó desmontar a Data para estudiarlo.

crew_archetypes.name: Bruce Maddox
crew_archetypes.flavor: In pursuit of the truth, Maddox finds himself hunted by the Tal Shiar and chained by debt. His life on the run may be in greater danger than he realizes.

crew_archetypes.name: Metron
crew_archetypes.flavor: Finding the crew of the Gorn ship and the Enterprise to still be savage, the Metron pit the captains from each vessel against each other. However, Kirk’s decision to show the Gorn captain mercy impresses the Metron as well.

crew_archetypes.name: T'Pel
crew_archetypes.flavor: Tuvok's cherished wife and one of the many family members left behind after Voyager was flung into the Delta Quadrant.

action.name: To You, My Husband, I Consecrate All That I Am

crew_archetypes.name: Bareil Antos vedek
crew_archetypes.flavor: Bareil, miembro moderado de la Asamblea Vedek, fue el rival de Winn como candidato a nuevo Kai.

crew_archetypes.name: First Officer Una
crew_archetypes.flavor: Una is a talented helmsman (and singer) serving as First Officer under Captain Pike on the USS Enterprise.

crew_archetypes.name: Huntress Z'ymira
crew_archetypes.flavor: It’s hard for Z'ymira to have a relationship with Sir Adya, having sworn her allegiance to the Forest. Still, she can be an ally to King Ridley

action.name: I Can Shoot It With An Arrow, If That Helps

crew_archetypes.name: Una on Trial
crew_archetypes.flavor: Arrested for concealing her identity as an Illyrian, the tribunal ultimately granted Una asylum and returned her to her post.

crew_archetypes.name: Asesino antediano
crew_archetypes.flavor: Haciéndose pasar por un dignatario, este asesino sube a bordo del Enterprise-D con su compañero para intentar poner una bomba en una conferencia próxima.

crew_archetypes.name: Mr. Homn
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ambassador Troi’s valet. A man of few - or rather no - words. Very attentive, though sometimes it became irritating.

crew_archetypes.name: Grateful Mr. Homn
crew_archetypes.flavor: Homn conducts the dinner according to Betazoid tradition: he knocks on the chime, which escalates tensions.

crew_archetypes.name: G. Burnham Qowat Milat
crew_archetypes.flavor: Al verse de vuelta en Essov IV, Gabrielle se une a la orden de las Qowat Milat después de que la curaran. Sirve como shalankhkai para Michael Burnham ante el consejo.

crew_archetypes.name: Gabrielle Burnham ángel
crew_archetypes.flavor: Gabrielle burla el ataque klingon usando el traje del Ángel Rojo, pero descubre que ahora está atrapada en la línea temporal futura.

action.name: El tiempo no está de nuestra parte

crew_archetypes.name: Kov
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kov served as an engineer aboard the Vahklas. He struggled with the decision to reconnect with his estranged, ailing father.

crew_archetypes.name: Primero Goran'Agar
crew_archetypes.flavor: Superviviente de un aterrizaje forzoso, se descubrió que Goran'Agar producía de forma natural la droga de ketracel blanco.

crew_archetypes.name: Fundador cambiante
crew_archetypes.flavor: Esta cambiante era una más de los muchos fundadores y dirigía todas las acciones del Dominio en el cuadrante Alfa.

crew_archetypes.name: Martia
crew_archetypes.flavor: Prisionera camaleoide de Rura Penthe, Martia intentó sabotear la huida de Kirk y McCoy a cambio de un indulto.

action.name: No le has dado en sus rodillas

crew_archetypes.name: Vic Fontaine
crew_archetypes.flavor: El holograma consciente de Vic dirige el holoprograma «El salón de Las Vegas de Vic», muy popular entre los altos mandos del EP9.

crew_archetypes.name: Dukat klingon
crew_archetypes.flavor: Tras capturar una nave klingon, Dukat y su tripulación continuaron solos con la lucha cardasiana contra los klingon.

crew_archetypes.name: Dukat del Dominio
crew_archetypes.flavor: Como líder de Cardassia, Dukat cumplió su promesa de recuperar el Espacio profundo nueve de las manos de la Federación.

crew_archetypes.name: Dukat del culto pah-wraith
crew_archetypes.flavor: Dukat fundó el culto pah-wraith en la estación cardasiana abandonada Empok Nor.

crew_archetypes.name: Dukat disfrazado de Breen
crew_archetypes.flavor: Dukat disfrazado de Breen

crew_archetypes.name: Rebel Calvin Hudson
crew_archetypes.flavor: Hudson joined the Maquis and played both sides, taking advantage of his position in the Federation.

action.name: Nobody Wants Peace Any More Than The Maquis

crew_archetypes.name: Wixiban
crew_archetypes.flavor: Neelix’s former associate whose reappearance threatens to take him down a dark path.

action.name: You're Living In A Dream World. It's Time To Wake Up.

crew_archetypes.name: Tte. Jadzia Dax
crew_archetypes.flavor: Jadzia es la oficial científica en Espacio profundo nueve y la última de una serie de anfitriones del simbionte Dax.

crew_archetypes.name: Dax del s. XXIII
crew_archetypes.flavor: Jadzia se transportó al pasado mediante el Orbe del Tiempo e impidió que los klingon asesinaran a Kirk.

crew_archetypes.name: Ezri Dax francotiradora
crew_archetypes.flavor: Usando un TR-116 modificado, Ezri Dax luchó en un duelo de rifles contra el teniente Chu'lak en Espacio profundo nueve.

crew_archetypes.name: Jadzia Dax del pacto de sangre
crew_archetypes.flavor: Haciendo honor a un juramento de Curzon, Jadzia vengó a los hijos de Kang, Koloth y Kor.

crew_archetypes.name: Jadzia novia klingon
crew_archetypes.flavor: Jadzia escogió un atuendo de boda klingon tradicional para casarse con el segundo comandante Worf.

crew_archetypes.name: Princesa Jadzia
crew_archetypes.flavor: En un intento por entretener a la mayor Kira, Jadzia concertó una visita a un holoprograma de Camelot.

action.name: Ya era hora de que volvieras

crew_archetypes.name: Jadzia Dax de los Disturbios Bell

action.name: Tenemos que encontrar a mis amigos

crew_archetypes.name: Estimado Curzon Dax
crew_archetypes.flavor: Séptimo huésped del simbionte Dax, amigo íntimo y mentor de Sisko, y un excelente diplomático.

crew_archetypes.name: Yedrin Dax
crew_archetypes.flavor: Yedrin es descendiente de Jadzia y el actual huésped del simbionte de Dax, quien también carga con la culpa del error de sus ancestros.

crew_archetypes.name: Returning Ezri Dax
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ezri never imagined that visiting her family would result in her brother's imprisonment. Another victim of her mother's high expectations.

action.name: I Should Have Gone Home a Long Time Ago.

crew_archetypes.name: Symbiont Pool Jadzia
crew_archetypes.flavor: Horrible visions tormented Jadzia's mind until she reconnected with Joran at the Symbiont Pools. He was a part of her, after all.

action.name: You Are a Part of Me.

crew_archetypes.name: Verad Dax
crew_archetypes.flavor: Verad wanted to be joined so desperately that he could not accept the Commission's refusal and decided to steal Dax from Jadzia.

action.name: I Don't Want Your Advice. I Want To Be Awake.

crew_archetypes.name: Darlene Kursky
crew_archetypes.flavor: Darlene Kursky was a secretary at Incredible Stories. She was fond of science fiction, and Benny’s story delighted her.

crew_archetypes.name: Rejoined Jadzia Dax
crew_archetypes.flavor: Dax meets the wife of a previous host, and faces a difficult choice: give in to feelings or honor taboos.

crew_archetypes.name: Niners Jadzia
crew_archetypes.flavor: Jadzia is upset about having missed a chance to strike out Solok and his Logicians!

action.name: Mejor su mundo que el nuestro

crew_archetypes.name: Dr. Soong
crew_archetypes.flavor: Cibernético creador de los androides Data y Lore, entre otros.

crew_archetypes.name: Humanoide antiguo
crew_archetypes.flavor: Una de las especies conscientes más antiguas y, posiblemente, la primera especie humanoide que evolucionó en la Vía Láctea en un antiguo planeta.

action.name: Si puedes verme y oírme, aún queda esperanza

crew_archetypes.name: Pirate Tendi
crew_archetypes.flavor: Tendi is cast as the savage warrior queen who comes from a long line of Orion Pirates, in the Holonovel “Crisis Point” created by Mariner.

crew_archetypes.name: Tendi and The Dog
crew_archetypes.flavor: Tendi's hand-edited, genetically sequenced Dog may not be quite like Earth dogs, but she's still a good girl with some freakish powers.

action.name: Who Has Malleable Protein Bonds? You Do!

crew_archetypes.name: Ensign Tendi
crew_archetypes.flavor: Tendi left her pirate days behind to join Starfleet. She brings relentless enthusiasm and friendship to the entire team.

action.name: Did That Full Molecular Engorgement Feel Amazing?!

crew_archetypes.name: Chief Medical Officer Tendi
crew_archetypes.flavor: Battling her conscience while serving as CMO in a drill, Tendi might be more dangerous for her Klingon patient than anything he had planned.

crew_archetypes.name: EV Suit Tendi
crew_archetypes.flavor: Tendi is helping repair a satellite when a nebula catches her eye. Unfortunately, it’s at that moment the Cerritos beams away to answer a distress call.

action.name: Wow, Would You Look At That?

crew_archetypes.name: Mistress of the Winter Constellations
crew_archetypes.flavor: Prior to joining Starfleet, Tendi was a member of the Orion Syndicate, where she seems to have developed a fearsome reputation.

action.name: Shut Up And Do Your Job!

crew_archetypes.name: Scorpion Tendi
crew_archetypes.flavor: An enraged Tendi picks up a strange pink cube that turns her into a huge scorpion.

crew_archetypes.name: Ki Mendrossen
crew_archetypes.flavor: Sarek's chief of staff. Together with Perrin, he hid Sarek's illness as long as he could, so that the Legaran conference could still take place.

action.name: I Can Not Delay The Conference

crew_archetypes.name: Escritor Jake Sisko
crew_archetypes.flavor: Durante la ocupación de Terok Nor por parte del Dominio, Jake escribe artículos para el Departamento de prensa de la Federación.

crew_archetypes.name: Jake Sisko del desierto
crew_archetypes.flavor: «A Jake le cuesta seguirle el ritmo a la errática búsqueda de su padre mientras cuida de su abuelo exhausto».

crew_archetypes.name: Pah-Wraith Jake Sisko
crew_archetypes.flavor: Fulfilling an ancient prophecy, Kosst Amojan took over Jake's body and it would have led to disaster if Kai Winn had not driven him out.

crew_archetypes.name: Reflective Jake Sisko
crew_archetypes.flavor: Jake Sisko looks out at the wormhole where his father currently resides and reflects back on everything that has happened.

crew_archetypes.name: Dahj activada
crew_archetypes.flavor: Mujer androide que se creía humana. Activó sus habilidades de combate durante el ataque romulano.

crew_archetypes.name: Dahj a la fuga
crew_archetypes.flavor: Con su vida en peligro y su mundo en ruinas, Dahj busca la ayuda de Picard.

crew_archetypes.name: Jhet'leya
crew_archetypes.flavor: Una compañera de la tripulación que se creía muerta y regresó al Voyager, perseguida por los alienígenas que la revivieron.

action.name: Hay una primera vez para todo

crew_archetypes.name: Ilon Tandro
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ilon Tandro came to Deep Space Nine to extradite Jadzia Dax, seeking justice for his father, whom he believed had been betrayed by Curzon Dax.

action.name: This Is Not At All Relevant.

crew_archetypes.name: Doctor Chaotica
crew_archetypes.flavor: El doctor Chaotica, villano de la holonovela del capitán Protón, libró una guerra contra las formas de vida fotónicas del subespacio.

crew_archetypes.name: Amanda Grayson en espera
crew_archetypes.flavor: Después de suplicarle a Spock que ayude a su padre, Sarek, Amanda espera ansiosamente a que el procedimiento se complete.

action.name: Tu deber es hacia tu padre

crew_archetypes.name: Amanda Grayson de graduación
crew_archetypes.flavor: Como madre adoptiva de Burnham, siempre la apoyaba y le recordaba que conservase su lado humano.

crew_archetypes.name: Zimmerman holoingeniero
crew_archetypes.flavor: El doctor Lewis Zimmerman llega a Espacio Profundo Nueve para utilizar a Bashir como modelo para su nuevo holograma médico de larga duración.

crew_archetypes.name: Philippa Georgiou armada
crew_archetypes.flavor: La capitana Georgiou excavó un pozo de los crepusculanos que se había secado y salvó a la especie de la sequía.

action.name: La Flota Estelar nunca dispara primero

crew_archetypes.name: Almirante Georgiou
crew_archetypes.flavor: A bordo del Discovery, Georgiou se hace pasar por almirante cuando las Fuerzas de Defensa de la Tierra la someten a una inspección.

crew_archetypes.name: Cabaret Georgiou
crew_archetypes.flavor: Georgiou’s actions during the operation on Qo’noS earn her an invitation into Section 31 while she is laying low in an Orion cabaret.

action.name: I’ll Ask Again--What Do You Want?
Esto es un acto de misericordia

crew_archetypes.name: Harry Kim proscrito
crew_archetypes.flavor: Cincuenta años después de perder el Voyager en un intento de regresar a casa, Harry decidió alterar el pasado para salvar la nave.

action.name: Por manos forjadas en el infierno

crew_archetypes.name: Kim prisionero
crew_archetypes.flavor: Atrapado en una cárcel akritiriana, Kim debe recurrir a medidas desesperadas para sobrevivir.

crew_archetypes.name: Harry Kim de Fair Haven
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ante la perspectiva de pasar una noche con Maggie, Harry Kim replica unas flores y se pone un bonito traje.

action.name: Es tarde para un paseo a medianoche

crew_archetypes.name: Harry Kim alternativo
crew_archetypes.flavor: Después de que el Kim del Voyager original muriera en combate contra los viidianos, un Voyager alternativo envía a su versión de Kim a la nave original con Naomi Wildman en brazos.

crew_archetypes.name: Caretaker Kim
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kim wakes up in a medical facility with strange sores. He learns he and Torres are ill and could be dangerous to their respective crews.

crew_archetypes.name: Luau Kim
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kim is interested in the holographic Marayna, so he comes to the Luau party. But he leaves after learning that Tuvok is also not indifferent to the hologram.

action.name: Listen, I'm Going Back To My Quarters

crew_archetypes.name: Lieutenant Harry Kim
crew_archetypes.flavor: Lieutenant Kim meets his other selves and is outraged that they are still ensigns. He believes the Kims will be better off in his reality.

action.name: El momento para la diplomacia ya ha pasado

crew_archetypes.name: Buckley
crew_archetypes.flavor: The alien protecting Oriana that has been infected by Gorn eggs, which hatch and lead to a violent confrontation.

crew_archetypes.name: Dr. Adam Soong
crew_archetypes.flavor: A scientist obsessed with the idea of ​​artificially creating life. He created “daughters”, but they did not live long, despite all his not always legal efforts.

action.name: You Exist Because I Willed It

crew_archetypes.name: Sr. Vup
crew_archetypes.flavor: El Sr. Vup, guardaespaldas de Bjayzl, evalúa y considera los riesgos de la oferta de Ríos y Picard.

action.name: No se acaba hasta que se acaba

crew_archetypes.name: Elnor afligido
crew_archetypes.flavor: Elnor llora la pérdida de Picard, alguien que desempeñó un papel fundamental en su vida.

crew_archetypes.name: Qalankhkai Elnor
crew_archetypes.flavor: After reuniting, Elnor takes up Picard’s lost cause per his Qowat Milat training.

crew_archetypes.name: Displaced Elnor
crew_archetypes.flavor: Transported by Q to an alternate timeline, Elnor finds himself in great danger due to his Romulan heritage.

crew_archetypes.name: Glinn Damar
crew_archetypes.flavor: Otrora tripulante del carguero Groumall, Damar sirvió como segundo al mando de Dukat en muchas y diversas misiones.

crew_archetypes.name: Damar revolucionario
crew_archetypes.flavor: Líder de la revolución cardasiana contra el Dominio, Damar fue asesinado por jem'hadar poco antes del ataque final.

crew_archetypes.name: Maab
crew_archetypes.flavor: While playing to both the Klingons and Federation in the mining negotiations, Maab assassinated the current Teer and seized power.

action.name: I Begin To Like You, Earthman...

crew_archetypes.name: Laris investigadora
crew_archetypes.flavor: Laris, acompañando a Picard, se sirve de una tecnología romulana ilegal para investigar a Dahj.

crew_archetypes.name: Laris de seguridad
crew_archetypes.flavor: Haciendo uso de sus talentos ocultos, Laris rechaza el ataque romulano y defiende a Picard.

crew_archetypes.name: Second Chance Laris
crew_archetypes.flavor: Laris dealt with her complicated feelings for Picard a year and a half after Zhaban’s death.

action.name: We Love Deeply, And Then We Honor That Love By Loving Again

crew_archetypes.name: Los setas
crew_archetypes.flavor: Una especie muy avanzada y misteriosa persiguió de forma sigilosa al Enterprise y lo atacó sin motivo aparente.

crew_archetypes.name: Sybok
crew_archetypes.flavor: Un vulcano iconoclasta, Sybok abrazó las emociones y buscó el planeta paradisíaco de Sha Ka Ree.

crew_archetypes.name: Wonderland Taylor
crew_archetypes.flavor: Beamed down the rabbit hole, Gillian Taylor is amazed by the transporter technology from the future.

crew_archetypes.name: Lore
crew_archetypes.flavor: El primer androide del doctor Soong con un cerebro positrónico funcional. Era capaz de sentir y era el «hermano» mayor de Data.

crew_archetypes.name: Lore el único
crew_archetypes.flavor: Cuando Lore robó un chip emocional que pretendía ser para Data, se convirtió en el líder de una nave borg disidente.

crew_archetypes.name: Alférez Mayweather
crew_archetypes.flavor: Timonel del Enterprise NX-01, Travis Mayweather exploró nuevos mundos junto al capitán Archer.

crew_archetypes.name: Mayweather naonato
crew_archetypes.flavor: Travis Mayweather fue uno de los primeros «neonatos espaciales», personas nacidas en el espacio.

crew_archetypes.name: Mayweather de Tuskegee
crew_archetypes.flavor: Inspirado en las aventuras en la holocubierta de O'Brien y Bashir, Mayweather de Tuskegee hizo su aparición durante la Segunda Batalla de Nueva York.

crew_archetypes.name: Mayweather de MACO táctico
crew_archetypes.flavor: Tras alistarse como guardaespaldas personal de Archer, Mayweather decide desafiar las órdenes del almirante Forrest para ayudarlo.

crew_archetypes.name: Mayweather con traje medioambiental
crew_archetypes.flavor: Durante una misión exterior para estudiar un cometa, Mayweather y Reed se lo pasan pipa en la nieve.

crew_archetypes.name: Abducted Travis
crew_archetypes.flavor: Travis was found tied to a repair station. It seems he is dead, but there is still a chance to save him.

crew_archetypes.name: Weightlifter Travis
crew_archetypes.flavor: Travis learned long ago the pain of training could help drown out romantic temptation, but there may be more at play here than he realizes.

action.name: Get Them Out Of My Head! The Pain Helps.

crew_archetypes.name: Deral
crew_archetypes.flavor: En Meridian, que alterna entre un estado corpóreo e incorpóreo cada sesenta años, Deral busca la forma de mantener su planeta en ese plano.

action.name: No está saliendo como yo pensaba...
Estoy atrapado con vosotros los mortales

crew_archetypes.name: Botánica Keiko
crew_archetypes.flavor: Keiko, jefa del laboratorio botánico del Enterprise, abrió más adelante una escuela en Espacio profundo nueve.

crew_archetypes.name: Soren
crew_archetypes.flavor: Un miembro de la especie andrógina j'naii (que más tarde revela que se identifica como mujer) se une a Riker en una misión de rescate.

action.name: No hay nada que no me resulte familiar

crew_archetypes.name: Princess Thalia and Runa
crew_archetypes.flavor: Princess Thalia will stay behind guarding her little princess Runa. Should King Ridley fall in battle, she will sing an epic song to honor him.

crew_archetypes.name: Valeo Beta V La'an
crew_archetypes.flavor: While on a mission to Valeo Beta V to find survivors, La'an encounters the Gorn again. She has to overcome her anger in order to help the victims.

crew_archetypes.name: Dress Uniform La'an
crew_archetypes.flavor: La’an’s gratitude to Una for saving her life shows as she speaks up on her friend and crewmate’s behalf.

action.name: I Wouldn't Be Alive If It Weren't For Una

crew_archetypes.name: 21st Century La'an
crew_archetypes.flavor: Together with Kirk, La’an ends up in Toronto, where they not only need to survive, but also find the reactor.

action.name: I'm Not Gonna Stop Now. So Open The Door.

crew_archetypes.name: Possessed Felisa Howard
crew_archetypes.flavor: During her lifetime, Felisa had a lover, Ronin, who was an anaphasic creature and who possessed her exhumed corpse.

crew_archetypes.name: Alférez Tuvok
crew_archetypes.flavor: Tuvok, alférez del USS Excelsior bajo el mando del capitán Sulu, estuvo presente durante el rescate de James Kirk y Leonard McCoy.

crew_archetypes.name: Jefe de seguridad Tuvok
crew_archetypes.flavor: Jefe de seguridad bajo la capitana Janeway y antiguo infiltrado de la nave maquis Val Jean.

action.name: La ética de viajar en el tiempo

crew_archetypes.name: Tuvok maquis
crew_archetypes.flavor: En una misión de la Flota Estelar para infiltrarse entre los maquis, Tuvok se unió a la nave y la célula de Chakotay.

action.name: La lógica es un arma poderosa
El capitán siempre tiene la razón

crew_archetypes.name: Tuvok estrellado
crew_archetypes.flavor: Tras estrellarse contra una luna, Tuvok intenta cuidar de un trío de niños asustados allí atrapados mientras repara su lanzadera.

crew_archetypes.name: Mirror Tuvok
crew_archetypes.flavor: In the Mirror Universe, Tuvok was a member of the Terran Rebellion, and used his species’ inherent logic to fight the Klingon-Cardassian Alliance.

action.name: Logic Dictates Caution In The Face Of A Superior Enemy

crew_archetypes.name: Captain Tuvok
crew_archetypes.flavor: A rescued Captain Tuvok showed Seven her final review from Shaw before promoting her to captain.

crew_archetypes.name: Investigator Tuvok
crew_archetypes.flavor: To aid Carol Freeman's investigation, Tuvok uses an invasive mind meld to uncover the truth behind the attack on Pakled.

crew_archetypes.name: Pastry Chef Tuvok
crew_archetypes.flavor: Tuvok's compromised state allowed him to become closer to Neelix and discover his pastry talent.

action.name: Would You Like Some Terra Nut Soufflé, Captain?

crew_archetypes.name: Palor Toff
crew_archetypes.flavor: Merchant and collector of rare items. He is so passionate about it that he agreed to get on board to evaluate a unique specimen - Commander Data.

crew_archetypes.name: Teniente Saavik
crew_archetypes.flavor: Oficial vulcana destinada al USS Enterprise, demostró su valía en la batalla con el USS Reliant.

crew_archetypes.name: Varani
crew_archetypes.flavor: A talented Bajoran musician who dreams of resurrecting the Jaland Forum.

crew_archetypes.name: Alicia Travers
crew_archetypes.flavor: Forma parte de la resistencia en Nueva York. Alicia ayuda a Archer a liberar su ciudad y a restablecer la línea temporal del siglo XX.

crew_archetypes.name: Jenna Mitchell
crew_archetypes.flavor: Jenna Mitchell was assigned to the Enterprise as Operations Officer. Her professionalism and versatility has helped the crew on many occasions.

crew_archetypes.name: Tilly de «La colonia»
crew_archetypes.flavor: En busca de ayuda para reparar el equipo de comunicaciones, Tilly acompaña a Saru en una misión exterior.

crew_archetypes.name: Tilly de fiesta
crew_archetypes.flavor: En una fiesta en el Discovery, Tilly se divierte mientras le da a Burnham unos consejos románticos que esta no le ha pedido.

crew_archetypes.name: Capitana en funciones Tilly
crew_archetypes.flavor: El plan de Tilly de construir una bomba obliga a tomar decisiones difíciles a medida que el oxígeno se agota en el Discovery.

crew_archetypes.name: Tilly del país de las maravillas
crew_archetypes.flavor: Tilly sabe que tiene mucho que aprender, pero está decidida a convertirse en capitana algún día.

crew_archetypes.name: Science Officer Tilly
crew_archetypes.flavor: As the Discovery finds its new place in the 32nd century, Tilly finds hers in the role of Science Officer aboard the ship.

crew_archetypes.name: Daring Tilly
crew_archetypes.flavor: Along with Adira, Tilly leads a training mission for cadets. Overcoming the obstacles they face leads Tilly to make an important choice.

action.name: This Is Real. This Is Happening.

crew_archetypes.name: Enterprise Tilly
crew_archetypes.flavor: In a timeline where she remained in the 23rd century, Tilly embraced her curiosity while working her way up to science officer.

crew_archetypes.name: Hacking Tilly
crew_archetypes.flavor: Tilly enthusiastically agrees to hack the database, because working with the cadets turned out to be more boring than she imagined.

action.name: Prepare To Kiss My Caffeinated Ass

crew_archetypes.name: Straal
crew_archetypes.flavor: Exomicólogo y capitán del USS Glenn. Descubrió la red micelial junto con Paul Stamets.

action.name: Ahora mismo, debemos terminar de prepararnos.
Nos tomamos la política muy en serio

crew_archetypes.name: Barry Waddle
crew_archetypes.flavor: Barry, un agente de la inteligencia klingon disfrazado de comerciante humano, queda atrapado en Cardassia Prime durante la guerra klingon-cardasiana.

crew_archetypes.name: Arne Darvin
crew_archetypes.flavor: Un agente klingon disfrazado cuyos planes de envenenar un cargamento de grano se vieron frustrados por unas bolas de pelo.

crew_archetypes.name: Kashyk
crew_archetypes.flavor: Inspector Kashyk believed telepaths were dangerous so he became romantically involved with Janeway to suss them out on the Federation ship.

action.name: Trust Has To Be Earned. It's Gradual.

crew_archetypes.name: Data de la era de la navegación a vela
Data Carlos
crew_archetypes.flavor: El teniente Data adopta el papel de Carlos en una de las holonovelas de Dixon Hill de Picard.

crew_archetypes.name: Data del sacrificio de Némesis
crew_archetypes.flavor: Se sacrifica para salvar al capitán Picard y la tripulación del USS Enterprise-E en la batalla contra el pretor Shinzon.

crew_archetypes.name: Data mosquetero
crew_archetypes.flavor: Aparece un mosquetero holográfico con el rostro de Data para enfrentarse a Barclay.

crew_archetypes.name: Data repartidor de cartas
crew_archetypes.flavor: Gracias a su dominio de las estadísticas y las probabilidades, Data debería ganar a cualquier jugador de la Flota Estelar. Ojalá pudiera leer sus caras.

action.name: ¿Es eso lo que se conoce como cara de póker?

crew_archetypes.name: Profesor Data
crew_archetypes.flavor: En este futuro alternativo, Data ocupa la cátedra lucasiana de matemáticas en la Universidad de Cambridge.

crew_archetypes.name: Hollow Data
crew_archetypes.flavor: Data’s encounter with Tam Elbrun and Gomtuu teaches him about the human desire to belong somewhere.

crew_archetypes.name: Data and Spot
crew_archetypes.flavor: Data loves his cat Spot so much, he even wrote an “Ode to Spot”!

action.name: Oh, Spot, The Complex Levels of Behavior You Display!

crew_archetypes.name: First Officer Data
crew_archetypes.flavor: Data rises up to First Officer as a replacement for Riker after a rather uptight captain took over the Enterprise in Picard’s absence.

crew_archetypes.name: Dress Uniform Data
crew_archetypes.flavor: In honor of Riker's and Deanna's “conjugation” Data took the stage and gave a performance that blew everybody away.

action.name: Oh, Blue Skies, Smiling at Meeee

crew_archetypes.name: Phantasms Data
crew_archetypes.flavor: Data's dream system malfunctions and he becomes a prisoner of repeating and worsening nightmares.

action.name: Have You Ever Had A Nightmare?

crew_archetypes.name: Bridge Officer Data
crew_archetypes.flavor: Data reclaims his seat on the Enterprise-D bridge, but could something grander be in store for the fleet's first acting android captain?

crew_archetypes.name: Data as Masaka
