crew_archetypes.flavor: Haciéndose pasar por un intermed en Nubelibre, Ríos le presenta a Picard, disfrazado, al socio de Bjayzl, el Sr. Vup, para rescatar a Maddox.

crew_archetypes.name: Farewell Rios
crew_archetypes.flavor: Rios finally found a place he felt at home on Earth in the 21st century. He stayed to create a better future.

crew_archetypes.name: Will Riker
crew_archetypes.flavor: William Riker, primer oficial del U.S.S. Enterprise-D, prosiguió su anecdótica carrera en la Flota Estelar.

crew_archetypes.name: Tte. Thomas Riker
crew_archetypes.flavor: Separado de William Riker durante el accidente con un transportador, Thomas Riker estuvo perdido durante ocho años.

crew_archetypes.name: Comandante Riker
crew_archetypes.flavor: En su tiempo libre, el comandante Riker a menudo organizaba noches de póker para sus compañeros del puente.

crew_archetypes.name: Almirante Riker
crew_archetypes.flavor: Al igual que en la última prueba de Q a Picard, el almirante Riker utilizó el Enterprise-D para sellar una grieta en el antitiempo.

crew_archetypes.name: Riker de la era de la navegación a vela
Riker mintakano
crew_archetypes.flavor: En una misión para evaluar la contaminación cultural en Mintaka, Riker se hizo pasar por un comerciante mintakano.

crew_archetypes.name: Riker del U.S.S. Zheng He
crew_archetypes.flavor: Dejando atrás temporalmente una vida llena de pizzas de longaniza de conejicornio, Riker acudió a Coppelius en ayuda de Picard con el U.S.S. Zheng He.

crew_archetypes.name: Riker de la regencia
crew_archetypes.flavor: Un Riker desprevenido es transportado de repente de una cita en Ten Forward a un jardín del estilo de Jane Austen mediante los nuevos poderes de Amanda Rogers.

crew_archetypes.name: Riker del día del capitán Picard
crew_archetypes.flavor: Riker hace su mejor imitación de Picard para hacerle burla al capitán.

crew_archetypes.name: Worst Contact Riker
crew_archetypes.flavor: Riker and his team make first contact with a new civilization whose ways of showing respect are very peculiar.

crew_archetypes.name: Night Terrors Riker
crew_archetypes.flavor: Riker jumps out of bed and finds snakes wrapped around his leg. But a moment later they are no longer there - it was a hallucination.

action.name: I'd Be a Liar If I Said I Felt Like Myself

crew_archetypes.name: Bridge Riker
crew_archetypes.flavor: To defeat the Borg, you need to be quite risky and focused on your goal. Luckily, Riker is just that.

crew_archetypes.name: Groom Riker
crew_archetypes.flavor: Riker is on the verge of new frontiers - family life, command of a new ship, and new adventures lie ahead

crew_archetypes.name: Almirante Kirsten Clancy
crew_archetypes.flavor: Almirante de flota y comandante en jefe de la Flota Estelar a finales del siglo XXIV.

crew_archetypes.name: Marla McGivers
crew_archetypes.flavor: Marla, historiadora del Enterprise, ayudó a Khan en su plan de secuestro de la nave y se exilió con él en Ceti Alfa V.

crew_archetypes.name: Jefe de ingeniería La Forge
crew_archetypes.flavor: Jefe de ingeniería del Enterprise-D, Geordi La Forge era un miembro importante y con talento de la tripulación.

crew_archetypes.name: 2.º comandante La Forge
crew_archetypes.flavor: Tras lidiar con los borg, Geordi se encontró a sí mismo y al Enterprise-E en el 2063.

crew_archetypes.name: Capitán La Forge
crew_archetypes.flavor: Capitán del U.S.S. Challenger, Geordi intentó persuadir a Kim y a Chakotay de cambiar el pasado para salvar el Voyager.

crew_archetypes.name: La Forge de la era de la navegación a vela

action.name: No tengo nada del todo claro

crew_archetypes.name: Surata IV La Forge
crew_archetypes.flavor: Geordi uses himself as bait with some hostile vines, knowing he can count on Data’s quick android reflexes.

crew_archetypes.name: All Good Things La Forge
crew_archetypes.flavor: Due to Q's time rips, La Forge and Picard meet in the future, and La Forge helps the Captain get to the Neutral Zone to close the rifts.

action.name: I'm Trying, But There's a Lot of Interference

crew_archetypes.name: Bridge La Forge
crew_archetypes.flavor: Geordi’s secret restoration project becomes a key point of resistance against the Borg.

crew_archetypes.name: Dress Uniform La Forge
crew_archetypes.flavor: La Forge has quite a fun time at Troi and Riker's wedding, even managing to learn a little more about Guinan's personal life.

action.name: Did You Ever Think About Getting Married Again?

crew_archetypes.name: Capitán Kurn
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kurn, hijo de Mogh, se unió al Programa de Intercambio de Oficiales para encontrarse con Worf, su hermano perdido.

crew_archetypes.name: Vestido de satén de Lily Sloane
Koloth
crew_archetypes.flavor: Koloth, comandante de la nave klingon IKS Gr'oth, se topó con Kirk en la estación espacial K-7.

crew_archetypes.name: Koloth y Korax tribbleados
crew_archetypes.flavor: Not even the genetically engineered tribble hunting Glommer can manage to dig Koloth and Korax out of this particular pile of troubles.

crew_archetypes.name: Drone Magnus Hansen
crew_archetypes.flavor: An exobiologist who was assimilated along with his family during the capture of USS Raven.

crew_archetypes.name: Captain Sonya Gomez
crew_archetypes.flavor: Being an attentive and insightful captain, Gomez, together with the crew of the Cerritos, successfully completes the first contact mission.

action.name: Take Us In, Nice And Slow

crew_archetypes.name: Embajadora V'Lar
crew_archetypes.flavor: La embajadora V'Lar aprovecha su viaje a bordo del Enterprise para denunciar a los mazaritas.

crew_archetypes.name: Ensign Rita Tannenbaum
crew_archetypes.flavor: From Quark’s to Gaia to the Rikers’ wedding, this Deep Space Nine engineer may be inconspicuous, but is always there.

action.name: A Good Engineer Is Ready For Anything

crew_archetypes.name: Compromised Kamran Gant
crew_archetypes.flavor: After Gant was reanimated by Control, he lured Michael Burnham to ‘reconstruct’ her.

action.name: To Achieve One Requires The Other

crew_archetypes.name: Bela Oxmyx
crew_archetypes.flavor: Prominent Iotian male, boss of the syndicate that unites all territories on the planet.

crew_archetypes.name: Presage de los creadores de esferas
Degraded Sphere-Builder
crew_archetypes.flavor: Promised freedom in exchange for participating in an experiment, this Sphere Builder learned that his only freedom might come in complete cellular degradation.

action.name: When The Xindi Destroy Earth, My People Will Prevail

crew_archetypes.name: Emory Erickson
crew_archetypes.flavor: Mediante engaños, Erickson intentó usar el transportador molecular que había inventado para salvar a su hijo, que estaba atrapado en el subespacio.

crew_archetypes.name: Captain Rudolph Ransom
crew_archetypes.flavor: An exobiologist who was promoted to captain of a science ship after making first contact with the supposedly extinct Yridians.

crew_archetypes.name: Varria
crew_archetypes.flavor: Varria was Fajo's loyal assistant, despite his immorality. But realizing he did not value her, she was not afraid to turn on him.

crew_archetypes.name: Aurelio
crew_archetypes.flavor: Feeling indebted to Osyraa, Aurellio continued to work for her. But, learning more about her cruelty, his devotion faded away.

action.name: Is It… Safe To Work Here?

crew_archetypes.name: Molly O'Brien desplazada
crew_archetypes.flavor: Rescatan a Molly de un portal temporal y la devuelven al Espacio profundo nueve, pero solo después de que hubiera pasado diez años en un planeta deshabitado.

crew_archetypes.name: Henry Starling
crew_archetypes.flavor: Henry Starling marca el comienzo de la revolución informática al rescatar una nave temporal averiada. Ahora piensa viajar al futuro para conseguir más.

crew_archetypes.name: Almirante Cartwright
crew_archetypes.flavor: Cartwright, almirante de la Flota Estelar, participó en la conspiración contra la cumbre de paz entre los klingon y la Federación.

crew_archetypes.name: Dr. Brown
crew_archetypes.flavor: After the tragedy on Exo II, Dr. Brown continued to be Corby's assistant, but now as an android.

action.name: Es el deber del portador de la antorcha

crew_archetypes.name: Condesa Regina Bartholomew
crew_archetypes.flavor: Una mujer de alcurnia, ingeniosa y sagaz. Inteligente, perspicaz y aventurera. El profesor la adora.

action.name: ¿Insinúa que está más allá de mi comprensión?

crew_archetypes.name: Kejal
crew_archetypes.flavor: A hologram created in the likeness of a Cardassian. Was created as prey for a holographic training regimen, but was rescued by Iden.

action.name: I'm Not A Cardassian, I'm A Hologram

crew_archetypes.name: Kukulkan
crew_archetypes.flavor: Al reaparecer después de miles de años, Kukulkan se enfurece porque casi nadie le recuerda y amenaza con eliminar todo ser vivo a bordo del Enterprise.

crew_archetypes.name: Prince Billups
crew_archetypes.flavor: Despite all his mother’s tricks and deceptions, Billups never became king and remained in Starfleet.

action.name: This Is A New Low, Mother

crew_archetypes.name: Capitán tribble
crew_archetypes.flavor: Un tribble particularmente perseverante mete a Kirk en un aprieto cuando se apodera de la silla del capitán durante una disputa con las fuerzas klingon.

crew_archetypes.name: Chief Engineer Pelia
crew_archetypes.flavor: Teaching at the Academy bored Pelia. Therefore, she helped the crew steal the Enterprise, thanks to which she took the position of chief engineer.

action.name: If You're Going To Steal a Starship, Do It Correctly

crew_archetypes.name: Inspection Pelia
crew_archetypes.flavor: Pelia came onboard as the Enterprise’s new chief engineer, but found the shoes she had to fill were great and the holes in the hearts of the crew even greater.

crew_archetypes.name: Solkar
crew_archetypes.flavor: The first (officially recorded) contact between Vulcans and Humans was the moment this Vulcan met the human Zephram Cochrane.

crew_archetypes.name: AGIMUS
crew_archetypes.flavor: AGIMUS has a knack for sowing discord in order to upload himself into position of power.

action.name: You Are Too Late, AGIMUS Reigns!

crew_archetypes.name: Victorious AGIMUS
crew_archetypes.flavor: AGIMUS is sure he won after 'convincing' Boimler to connect him to the ship's computer, but is the machine about to 'Boim' himself?

action.name: This Planet... Nay, This System... Will Be Mine!

crew_archetypes.name: T'Paal
crew_archetypes.flavor: Posing as a Romulan mercenary, T'Paal planned to infiltrate Baran's ship and take all the pieces of the legendary Stone of Gol.

action.name: I Will Not Play Games With You

crew_archetypes.name: Kyheem mayordomo
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kyheem ejerce de mayordomo del santuario para proteger las cosechas kwejianas de las langostas marinas.

crew_archetypes.name: Ikhu Zhen Kyheem
crew_archetypes.flavor: After a long grudge against his brother, Kyheem reconciles with him and even asks him to perform the Ikhu Zhen ceremony for his son.

crew_archetypes.name: Leila Kalomi
crew_archetypes.flavor: Leila se enamoró de Spock y fue feliz cuando unas esporas que alteran la mente hicieron posible que él la correspondiera. No duró mucho.

action.name: Puede volver a formar parte de algo

crew_archetypes.name: Badgey
crew_archetypes.flavor: A virtual tutor developed by Ensign Rutherford, Badgey can walk you through any Starfleet exercise you can imagine.

action.name: Hi, Can I Teach You A Lesson?

crew_archetypes.name: Corrupted Badgey
crew_archetypes.flavor: Corrupted by his creator’s abuse, Badgey seeks revenge on Rutherford and those he cares about.

action.name: Can I Teach You A Lesson?

crew_archetypes.name: Richard Castillo
crew_archetypes.flavor: Castillo, timonel del Enterprise-C, asumió el mando tras la muerte de la capitana Garrett.

crew_archetypes.name: Chairman Siggi
crew_archetypes.flavor: A fanatical collector who not only wanted to steal someone else's collection, but also tricked Starfleet into it.

action.name: Take My Card. I Got A Top-Notch Menagerie.

crew_archetypes.name: Appropriate Attire Nevesa
crew_archetypes.flavor: This Romulan commander sees winning Spock’s heart as a way to win power and influence in the Empire - by using him to help her capture the Enterprise.

action.name: Then There Is A Truth Here That Remains Unspoken

crew_archetypes.name: George y Gracie
crew_archetypes.flavor: Tras ser rescatados de los balleneros por Kirk y su tripulación en 1986, estos héroes salvan el mundo en el siglo XXIII cantando en una sonda del espacio profundo.

crew_archetypes.name: The Pahvan
crew_archetypes.flavor: Intelligent inhabitants of the planet Pahvo, living in complete harmony with the world around them.

crew_archetypes.name: Comandante Tomalak
crew_archetypes.flavor: Comandante romulano que se enfrentó al U.S.S. Enterprise-D en varias ocasiones.

crew_archetypes.name: Axum
crew_archetypes.flavor: With the help of the Voyager crew, Axum set the Unimatrix Zero drones free, and became leader of the resistance movement against the Borg.

crew_archetypes.name: Emmet
crew_archetypes.flavor: One of several emergency holoprograms Captain Rios called on in case of urgent need. Emmet could serve as a stand-in tactical officer.

crew_archetypes.name: Clon 4 de Weyoun
crew_archetypes.flavor: Un clon vorta que supervisó la nave de ataque jem'hadar. Murió después de sofocar una rebelión jem'hadar.

crew_archetypes.name: Kevin Mulkahey
crew_archetypes.flavor: In one of Sisko's visions, Mulkahey was a plainclothes police officer in 1950’s New York who abused his power to harass Benny Russell.

crew_archetypes.name: Osyraa
crew_archetypes.flavor: Cuando sus intentos de ser diplomática con la Federación fracasan, Osyraa secuestra el USS Discovery y ataca el cuartel general de la Federación.

crew_archetypes.name: Jefa de ingeniería Torres
crew_archetypes.flavor: Oficial maquis mitad klingon, que más adelante se unió al U.S.S. Voyager como jefa de ingeniería.

crew_archetypes.name: Maquis amotinada Torres
crew_archetypes.flavor: Torres, controlada por Teero Anaydis, ayudó a liderar una revuelta maquis en el U.S.S. Voyager.

action.name: La fuerza bruta no servirá de nada

crew_archetypes.name: Barge of the Dead Torres
crew_archetypes.flavor: While unconscious, Torres finds her mother aboard the Barge of the Dead, bound for Gre’Thor, the realm of the Klingon afterlife meant for dishonored souls.

crew_archetypes.name: Orbital Skydiving Torres
crew_archetypes.flavor: B'Elanna engages in increasingly risky behavior in the Holodeck while mourning the loss of her Maquis crewmates.

crew_archetypes.name: Luau Torres
crew_archetypes.flavor: Torres appears at the luau in a tropical dress, and looks simply smashing.

action.name: Why Don't You Take a Break?

crew_archetypes.name: Caretaker Torres
crew_archetypes.flavor: Torres wakes up in a medical lab, where the Ocampan doctor informs her and Kim that he is protecting his population from 'their' disease.

action.name: I Don't Find This At All Amusing, Starfleet

crew_archetypes.name: Warship Torres
crew_archetypes.flavor: This ruthless half-Klingon warrior is believed to have helped engineer some of Voyager’s deadliest weapons.

action.name: It's A Little Late To Be Having Second Thoughts

crew_archetypes.name: Lt. Commander Ortegas
crew_archetypes.flavor: Helmsman of the U.S.S Enterprise under Captain Pike’s command, she brags about being the best pilot to graduate the academy.

crew_archetypes.name: Off-Duty Ortegas
crew_archetypes.flavor: As a light practical joke, Ortegas convinces Uhura to wear her dress uniform to the captain’s table.

action.name: Consider This Your First Square in Enterprise Bingo

crew_archetypes.name: Sir Adya Ortegas
crew_archetypes.flavor: Brought into the world of 'The Kingdom of Elysian', Ortegas becomes Sir Adya - the king’s faithful and devoted knight.

action.name: My King, We Have Been Led Into A Trap

crew_archetypes.name: Kalar Ortegas
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ortegas excitedly prepares for an operation on Rigel VII. Discouraged she can’t go, she may be right where she is needed most.

crew_archetypes.name: Orion Hurricane Ortegas
crew_archetypes.flavor: After getting an entire bottle of Orion delaq, Ortegas makes authentic Orion Hurricanes for everyone for Pike's birthday party.

action.name: Caras Gave Us a Bottle of Real Orion Delaq

crew_archetypes.name: Canciller K'mpec
crew_archetypes.flavor: K'mpec era el canciller klingon, dispuesto a todo con tal de mantener la paz en el Imperio klingon.

action.name: Dar la vida, matar, no hay diferencia

crew_archetypes.name: Syrran
crew_archetypes.flavor: Un filósofo vulcano que guía a Archer y T'Pol a través de la forja de Vulcano.

crew_archetypes.name: Cadet Harral
crew_archetypes.flavor: Along with other cadets, Harral took part in the research exercise on Geryon. As an Orion, he has had to work hard to earn trust and respect.

action.name: I Have To Work Twice As Hard

crew_archetypes.name: Tiron
crew_archetypes.flavor: Tiron gives Quark generous financial incentive to get him a 'custom' holosuite program featuring Major Kira.

crew_archetypes.name: Migleemo
crew_archetypes.flavor: The Cerritos’ counselor who is infamous for his inane food metaphors.

action.name: I Want You To Be A Cantaloupe

crew_archetypes.name: Pe'Nar Makull
crew_archetypes.flavor: Pe’Nar was sure that polaric energy would destroy his world, so he sabotaged the plant - leading to the destruction he so feared.

crew_archetypes.name: Comandante Demos
crew_archetypes.flavor: Un agente del gobierno dramiano que sirvió a Leonard McCoy y que posee una orden de detención por asesinato en masa en Dramia II.

crew_archetypes.name: Sord
crew_archetypes.flavor: Los vedala reclutaron a Sord junto a Kirk, Spock, Eme/3/Verde, Lara y Tchar para recuperar el Alma de los Skorr y evitar el inicio de una guerra.

action.name: Déjeme tratar a mí con él

crew_archetypes.name: Jae Hwang
crew_archetypes.flavor: Jae is Raffi's ex-husband. During a meeting at his bar on M’Talas Prime, he mistakenly believed that Raffi wanted to reunite with their son, but she needed help finding Sneed.

action.name: Right Here, Right Now. Make A Choice.

crew_archetypes.name: Carl, Guardián del Tiempo
crew_archetypes.flavor: Carl, una representación visual nueva del Guardián, vigila una puerta transdimensional en el siglo XXXII.

crew_archetypes.name: Norah Satie
crew_archetypes.flavor: Retired Admiral Norah Satie arrives on the Enterprise to ‘unravel a conspiracy’.

action.name: I Have No Friends. But I Have A Purpose.

crew_archetypes.name: Reed de Sección 31
crew_archetypes.flavor: Forzado a servir a la Sección 31, Malcolm Reed investigó un programa secreto klingon.

crew_archetypes.name: Reed turista
crew_archetypes.flavor: Malcolm Reed termina en una situación desesperada tras intentar encontrar compañía en el placentero planeta de Risa.

action.name: Seguir a los dos alienígenas hasta la base

crew_archetypes.name: EV Suit Reed
crew_archetypes.flavor: After Mayweather injures his leg while exploring Archer’s Comet, Reed helps him to escape.

crew_archetypes.name: Twilight Reed
crew_archetypes.flavor: In the alternate timeline, Reed was promoted to be captain of the Intrepid. However, he did not assume command due to the Xindi attack.

crew_archetypes.name: Birthday Cake Reed
crew_archetypes.flavor: A secret mission undertaken by a crewmate and friend brings a smile to the mysterious Malcom’s face.

crew_archetypes.name: T'Pring
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ni la esposa ni la prometida de Spock, T'Pring recurrió al kal-if-fee para estar con Stonn en su lugar.

crew_archetypes.name: T'Pring as Spock
crew_archetypes.flavor: Once in Spock's body, T'Pring is forced to do all his tasks, including negotiating with the R'ongovians, until the switch is undone.

crew_archetypes.name: V'Shal T'Pring
crew_archetypes.flavor: T'Pring insisted on a V'Shal dinner and invited her parents to perform the engagement ceremony to change their attitude toward Spock.

crew_archetypes.name: Lt. JG Kayshon
crew_archetypes.flavor: As the first Tamarian in Starfleet, Kayshon's time on the Cerritos includes being turned into a puppet and frequent mistranslations.

action.name: Bazminti When He Pulled Back The Veil Vibes

crew_archetypes.name: Kelis
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kelis, un dramaturgo, quiere usar sus obras para impedir la guerra entre facciones rivales en su planeta natal.

crew_archetypes.name: Primera oficial Burnham
crew_archetypes.flavor: Comandante de la Flota Estelar, Michael Burnham fue la primera oficial del U.S.S. Shenzhou.

action.name: No he venido a hacer amigos
El viejo Michael Burnham está muerto

crew_archetypes.name: Burnham mensajera
crew_archetypes.flavor: Burnham se une a Booker y ayuda a este como mensajera mientras espera el regreso del Discovery.

crew_archetypes.name: Burnham trill
crew_archetypes.flavor: Un holoprograma en mal estado a bordo de los restos del KSF Khi'eth hace que Burnham parezca trill.

crew_archetypes.name: Capitana Burnham
crew_archetypes.flavor: Al asumir la capitanía del Discovery, Burnham está lista para enfrentarse a los retos del futuro.

crew_archetypes.name: Burnham de la resistencia
crew_archetypes.flavor: La capitana Burnham siempre intenta llegar a un acuerdo pacífico, pero a veces hay que hacer las cosas de otra forma.

crew_archetypes.name: Inspiring Captain Burnham
crew_archetypes.flavor: As captain of the Discovery, Burnham continues her work to reignite the Federation and discover incredible new worlds.

crew_archetypes.name: Burnham at the Jump
crew_archetypes.flavor: With the U.S.S. Discovery fully equipped with a spore drive, Captain Burnham prepares to jump to a distressed station.

crew_archetypes.name: Academy Speech Burnham
crew_archetypes.flavor: After over a century's absence Starfleet Academy rises again, and it’s now up to the new graduates to define the future of the Federation.

action.name: I Feel Like Anything is Possible

crew_archetypes.name: Out of Time Burnham
crew_archetypes.flavor: Burnham survives being blown out into space, but she isn’t ready to give up her pursuit just yet.

crew_archetypes.name: Jogging Burnham
crew_archetypes.flavor: Burnham and Tilly forge a fierce friendship that helps both of them overcome the obstacles facing them together, bringing out the best in each other.

action.name: See Your Path. Stay On It. Reach Your Destination.

crew_archetypes.name: Q'Mau Burnham
crew_archetypes.flavor: Talking openly with Booker might prove harder than finding the stolen artifact on Q’Mau for Burnham.

crew_archetypes.name: Luther Sloan
crew_archetypes.flavor: Agente de la agencia secreta Sección 31, a menudo discutía con Julian Bashir.

crew_archetypes.name: Jojo Krako
crew_archetypes.flavor: Krako was a gangster boss on Sigma Iotia II who managed to stop the violence between two warring gangs through his actions.

action.name: I Haven't Been Arrested In My Whole Life!

crew_archetypes.name: Cadete Sito Jaxa
crew_archetypes.flavor: Cuando era miembro del Escuadrón Nova, Sito Jaxa sobrevivió a un accidente de vuelo en el que murió uno de sus compañeros cadetes.

crew_archetypes.name: Mok'bara Sito Jaxa
crew_archetypes.flavor: As part of the “ancient ritual” of the gik'tal, Jaxa must defend herself against an opponent while blindfolded.

crew_archetypes.name: Sarin
crew_archetypes.flavor: Disillusioned with the Cabal’s activities, Sarin created her own resistance movement.

action.name: The Price Of Evolution Was Too High

crew_archetypes.name: Sahil
crew_archetypes.flavor: Después de cuarenta años de obediente aislamiento, Sahil es nombrado oficial de comunicaciones de la Federación.

crew_archetypes.name: Teniente Sahil
crew_archetypes.flavor: Al ser nombrado teniente de manera oficial, se reconoce la dedicación de Sahil a la defensa de los ideales de la Federación Unida de Planetas.

crew_archetypes.name: Larkin en ropa interior
crew_archetypes.flavor: Larkin sale de sus dependencias en ropa interior para presenciar las consecuencias de sus experimentos no autorizados con los tribble.

crew_archetypes.name: Hy'Rell
crew_archetypes.flavor: Archivist and guide for Booker and Burnham through the Eternal Archive and Gallery, a huge library with rare books and artifacts.

crew_archetypes.name: Kurak
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kurak, especialista en la teoría de campos de curvatura, sirvió como asistente del doctor Reyga durante las pruebas del escudo metafásico a bordo del Enterprise-D.

crew_archetypes.name: Capitán Klaa
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ansioso por derrotar a Kirk y hacerse famoso, el capitán Klaa se enfrentó al Enterprise-A en Nimbus III.

crew_archetypes.name: Kellin
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kellin was a tracer and caught fugitives until she fell in love and ran away herself. But the circle is closed - she returns to Ramura.

action.name: I've Violated One Of Our Most Important Edicts

crew_archetypes.name: Carolyn Palamas griega
crew_archetypes.flavor: Palamas, quien recibe las atenciones de Apolo, debe decidir entre su tripulación o la voluntad de un supuesto dios.

crew_archetypes.name: Ezral
crew_archetypes.flavor: After the ship crashed, Ezral created a holographic team for himself and his daughter to provide them with companionship.

action.name: I've Made All The Friends I Need

crew_archetypes.name: Médico jefe «Bones» McCoy
crew_archetypes.flavor: Oficial médico jefe del U.S.S. Enterprise, Leonard McCoy era un buen amigo del capitán Kirk.

crew_archetypes.name: Prisionero «Bones» McCoy
crew_archetypes.flavor: Sentenciado a una vida de duro trabajo en el asteroide Rura Penthe, McCoy fue rescatado por Kirk y Spock.

crew_archetypes.name: McCoy de la Edad Media
crew_archetypes.flavor: McCoy se infiltró en los años 80 en un hospital de San Francisco para rescatar a un Chekov gravemente herido.

crew_archetypes.name: McCoy reclutado
crew_archetypes.flavor: Tras haberse retirado de la Flota Estelar, el doctor McCoy se puso furioso cuando lo llamaron para solucionar la crisis de V'ger.

crew_archetypes.name: McCoy con traje medioambiental
crew_archetypes.flavor: Vestido con un traje medioambiental y abordando el U.S.S. Defiant con sus compañeros de puente, McCoy intenta averiguar qué le pasó a su desafortunada tripulación.

crew_archetypes.name: McCoy del espejo
crew_archetypes.flavor: McCoy, un médico del universo espejo, tiene toca clase de instrumentos de tortura e interrogatorio.

crew_archetypes.name: McCoy julepe de menta
crew_archetypes.flavor: Leonard McCoy es un gran aficionado a los julepes de menta y a veces se prepara uno o dos para relajarse.

action.name: Relájese; se lo manda el doctor

crew_archetypes.name: McCoy tribble
crew_archetypes.flavor: McCoy sugiere una sencilla solución para el problema de la superpoblación tribble: dejar de alimentarlos.

crew_archetypes.name: Frantic McCoy
crew_archetypes.flavor: Doctor McCoy is not happy with Commodore Decker’s decision to attack the Doomsday Machine.

crew_archetypes.name: Base Camp McCoy
crew_archetypes.flavor: McCoy is not very happy with the way Kirk has chosen to spend his vacation and considers climbing the mountain to be an irresponsible act.

crew_archetypes.name: Admiral McCoy
crew_archetypes.flavor: Admiral McCoy was invited to examine the medical layout of the USS Enterprise-D, after which Data escorted him to the USS Hood.

action.name: You Treat Her Like A Lady... And She'll Always Bring You Home

crew_archetypes.name: McCoy in Command
crew_archetypes.flavor: Did McCoy ever imagine that he would one day be in the captain’s chair? Hardly. Does he like it? Not 100% sure.

action.name: I'm a Doctor, Not a Captain!

crew_archetypes.name: Dress Uniform McCoy
crew_archetypes.flavor: McCoy must testify in Kirk's criminal negligence investigation, even if he does so defiantly.

crew_archetypes.name: Edith Keeler
crew_archetypes.flavor: Edith dirigía una misión en Nueva York. Kirk se vio obligado a dejarla morir atropellada para no alterar su línea temporal.

action.name: Una vida digna de ser vivida

crew_archetypes.name: Ulis
crew_archetypes.flavor: Captain of the Ferengi pirates who infiltrated the USS Enterprise to plunder it. However, the pirates’ greed would be their downfall.

crew_archetypes.name: Primer maje Culluh
crew_archetypes.flavor: Culluh, primer maje de los kazon nistrim, logró tomar el control del U.S.S. Voyager por un breve periodo de tiempo.

crew_archetypes.name: Persis
crew_archetypes.flavor: Persis era una intensificada humana que llegó a entablar lazos muy fuertes con Arik Soong, a quien consideraba como un padre.

crew_archetypes.name: Teniente Valeris
crew_archetypes.flavor: La teniente Valeris, supuesta sucesora de Spock, facilitó los registros personales de Kirk como prueba contra él durante un juicio.

crew_archetypes.name: EV Suit Sam Kirk
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kirk joins a landing party to study a strange comet and prevent it from colliding with Persephone III

crew_archetypes.name: Valeo Beta V Sam Kirk
crew_archetypes.flavor: As part of the landing party, Sam went to Valeo Beta V to find out what happened to the USS Peregrine.

action.name: We Need To Alert The Rest Of The Crew

crew_archetypes.name: Lt. Sam Kirk
crew_archetypes.flavor: Starfleet officer, xenoanthropologist, who spends a lot of time in his laboratory

crew_archetypes.name: Técnico Fisher
crew_archetypes.flavor: Un geólogo y oficial científico superior que sirvió a las órdenes tanto de Pike como de Kirk a bordo del Enterprise.

crew_archetypes.name: Mot
crew_archetypes.flavor: A Bolian barber who works aboard the USS Enterprise. His tactical advice has come in handy more than once.

crew_archetypes.name: Mestral
crew_archetypes.flavor: Un vulcano tan fascinado con los humanos que arriesgaría la vida por ellos. Al final eligió vivir entre ellos.

action.name: Estoy dispuesto a correr el riesgo.
La Primera Directiva no es aplicable

crew_archetypes.name: Zho'Kaan
crew_archetypes.flavor: Stuck on a moon with Tucker, Zho’Kaan must figure out how to communicate with him so they can work together to escape.

crew_archetypes.name: General Chang
crew_archetypes.flavor: Chang, jefe de estado del canciller Gorkon, conspiró para provocar una guerra entre los klingon y la Federación.

crew_archetypes.name: Captain Robert DeSoto
crew_archetypes.flavor: Captain of the USS Hood, DeSoto delivers a sensitive mission and specialist to the “Galaxy boys” aboard the Enterprise.

crew_archetypes.name: Alférez Sato
crew_archetypes.flavor: Hoshi Sato es la oficial de comunicaciones a bordo del Enterprise. Su experiencia la llevó a crear un linguacódigo universal.

crew_archetypes.name: Emperatriz Sato del espejo
crew_archetypes.flavor: Tras hacerse con el Defiant en el universo espejo, Sato se autoproclamó emperatriz del Imperio terrano.

crew_archetypes.name: Sato tribble
crew_archetypes.flavor: Sato acepta amablemente tener un primer contacto con un tribble amistoso al cuidado del doctor Phlox.

crew_archetypes.name: Tourist Hoshi Sato
crew_archetypes.flavor: Hoshi enjoys learning the language of the places she visits. And she fascinates a Risan couple by learning their language and being able to keep up the conversation.

action.name: Na. No. How Am I Doing?

crew_archetypes.name: EV Suit Hoshi Sato
crew_archetypes.flavor: Hoshi takes part in her first away mission and has to overcome her own fears and doubts.

action.name: Well, I Just, I Bit My Lip And Got Through It

crew_archetypes.name: Shiboline M'Ress
crew_archetypes.flavor: M'Ress, una comunicadora nata, trabajó como oficial de comunicaciones bajo el mando del capitán Kirk.

crew_archetypes.name: Dream Alien Leader
crew_archetypes.flavor: The leader of a group of armed aliens who drew the Voyager crew into ceaseless nightmares.

action.name: As Long As You're Asleep, You're No Threat To Us

crew_archetypes.name: Figura humanoide
crew_archetypes.flavor: Incapaz de aparecer físicamente, la escurridiza figura humanoide intenta manipular los acontecimientos desde el distante siglo XXVIII.

crew_archetypes.name: Capitán John Harriman
crew_archetypes.flavor: La primera misión del capitán Harriman a bordo del Enterpise-B fue rescatar varias naves de refugiados del Nexus.

crew_archetypes.name: Amanda Cole
crew_archetypes.flavor: Amanda was assigned to the Enterprise where she took part in resolving the Xindi incident.

crew_archetypes.name: Capitán Dathon
crew_archetypes.flavor: Picard y Dathon en El-Adrel.

crew_archetypes.name: Stamets táctico
crew_archetypes.flavor: Stamets, quien ha conectado el Discovery al motor de esporas, se lanza parcialmente a la red micelial para rescatar a Tilly y a May.

crew_archetypes.name: Dress Uniform Stamets
crew_archetypes.flavor: The dangerous journeys are over and the best ending to it all is sharing the happiness of your longtime colleague and friend at his wedding.

crew_archetypes.name: Li Nalas
crew_archetypes.flavor: Líder de una de las muchas células de resistencia de Bajor durante la ocupación cardasiana.

crew_archetypes.name: Pel
crew_archetypes.flavor: Pel se disfrazó de hombre y demostró tener una gran capacidad para los negocios, rompiendo con el tópico de que las mujeres no saben ganar dinero.

crew_archetypes.name: Yeoman Leslie Thompson
crew_archetypes.flavor: Leslie became a victim of the Kelvan leaders when she fought him to prove her strength.

action.name: What Kind of People Are They?

crew_archetypes.name: Miranda Jones
crew_archetypes.flavor: La doctora Miranda Jones ha aprendido a controlar sus habilidades telepáticas tras estudiar durante muchos años en Vulcano. Al haber nacido ciega, es inmune a los efectos de los medusanos, a cuyo embajador acompaña a bordo del Enterprise.

action.name: Las emociones violentas son un tipo de locura

crew_archetypes.name: Princesa Tonia Barrows
crew_archetypes.flavor: Estando de permiso con McCoy, Barrows se imagina con un vestido de princesa de ensueño que, de algún modo, se materializa al instante.

crew_archetypes.name: Yeoman Barrows
crew_archetypes.flavor: Yeoman Barrows was one of the members of a group that became trapped on the shore leave planet.

action.name: It Is Beautiful. So Lovely, And Restful

crew_archetypes.name: Lt. Commander Ron Docent
crew_archetypes.flavor: His work on the U.S.S. Vancouver has left him exhausted from all the epic adventures. Now he just wants a simpler life on a smaller ship.

action.name: Do I Need To Remind You Who My Grandma’s Neighbor Was?

crew_archetypes.name: Solok lógico
crew_archetypes.flavor: Con el fin de generar una respuesta emocional negativa, Solok utiliza el deporte del béisbol para intentar avergonzar a Sisko.

action.name: No entiendo a qué viene esta celebración

crew_archetypes.name: Capitán Solok
crew_archetypes.flavor: Cuando se reúne con un viejo colega, el capitán Solok quiere reparar su nave y provocar una respuesta emocional mediante la competitividad.

crew_archetypes.name: DaiMon Solok
crew_archetypes.flavor: Solok, contratado por Picard, infiltró a Picard y a su equipo en un territorio controlado por los cardasianos.

crew_archetypes.name: Adán
crew_archetypes.flavor: Miembro de un grupo que buscaba el planeta Edén, Adán intentaba persuadir a los demás mediante la canción.

crew_archetypes.name: Assimilated Esmar
crew_archetypes.flavor: After the assimilation of Starfleet’s youngest, Esmar took control of the USS Titan.

crew_archetypes.name: Keevan
crew_archetypes.flavor: Tras sobrevivir a un accidente de nave, Keevan lideró a sus jem'hadar hasta que estos murieron y entonces se entregó al capitán Sisko.

crew_archetypes.name: Linus a desafió
crew_archetypes.flavor: Linus is having more trouble than most crew members learning to use a personal transporter.

crew_archetypes.name: Gran nagus Zek
crew_archetypes.flavor: Como gran nagus de los ferengi, Zek era el máximo gobernante de su especie.

crew_archetypes.name: Federation President Rillak
crew_archetypes.flavor: With the reinvigoration of the Federation, Rillak addresses the first class of Starfleet cadets in over a century.

action.name: It’s A Lot to Live Up To. No Pressure

crew_archetypes.name: Punk
crew_archetypes.flavor: Un hombre que solo disfruta de la música en el autobús antes de que Spock ponga fin a sus maleducados desplantes.

crew_archetypes.name: Brunt, F.C.A.
crew_archetypes.flavor: Liquidator Brunt of the Ferengi Commerce Authority is often called in to handle any suspect behavior from Quark and his family.

crew_archetypes.name: Alférez Ogawa
crew_archetypes.flavor: Alyssa Ogawa, enfermera principal del U.S.S. Enterprise-D, era imprescindible entre el personal médico de la Dra. Crusher.

crew_archetypes.name: Teniente Ogawa
crew_archetypes.flavor: Durante el ataque borg, Ogawa ayudó a evacuar a los heridos de la enfermería del Enterprise-E.

crew_archetypes.name: Portador de la antorcha Rejac
crew_archetypes.flavor: Guardián de las Balizas de Kahless.

crew_archetypes.name: Pascal Fullerton
crew_archetypes.flavor: Pascal, presidente del movimiento de los nuevos esencialistas, está decidido a «restaurar las tradiciones morales» de la Federación.

crew_archetypes.name: All-in Owosekun
crew_archetypes.flavor: Owosekun was picked for this mission because of her raw determination to act, which she shows again in the fighting ring with a knockout.

action.name: Vaya a donde quiera, cuando quiera

crew_archetypes.name: Guinan del siglo XX
crew_archetypes.flavor: Guinan, contemporánea de esta época, se encuentra con Picard por «primera» vez mientras este intenta evitar el asesinato de Data.

crew_archetypes.name: Young Guinan
crew_archetypes.flavor: The sight of a familiar face gives Picard a spark of hope, but Guinan hasn’t yet encountered him and wants no part of whatever he is into.

crew_archetypes.name: Festive Guinan
crew_archetypes.flavor: Together with everyone else, Guinan celebrates the wedding of Riker and Troi, and also talks about her own past and future marriages.

crew_archetypes.name: Deela
crew_archetypes.flavor: Deela is queen of the Scalosians. She falls for Kirk and, due to Scalosian male infertility, seeks to use the male crew of the Enterprise to continue their species.

action.name: We Move In The Wink Of An Eye

crew_archetypes.name: Comandante Tucker
crew_archetypes.flavor: Jefe de ingeniería a bordo del Enterprise NX-01, Tucker fue un oficial de acción siempre dispuesto a trabajar.

crew_archetypes.name: Tucker del espejo
crew_archetypes.flavor: Jefe de ingeniería del ISS Enterprise, Tucker consiguió evitar que sabotearan el U.S.S. Defiant.

crew_archetypes.name: Tucker de geskana
crew_archetypes.flavor: Después de ayudar a una nave varada, Archer y Trip se ponen a prueba en un deporte alienígena.

crew_archetypes.name: Mutinous Trip Tucker
crew_archetypes.flavor: Tucker confronts Archer when he, infected with an insectoid, begins to make strange and sometimes dangerous decisions for the crew.

crew_archetypes.name: Pregnant Trip Tucker
crew_archetypes.flavor: Tucker was faced with the fact that if you play a ‘game’ on an alien ship, you can not only have fun, but also get pregnant.

crew_archetypes.name: Desert Trip Tucker
crew_archetypes.flavor: Lured to an alien world and pulled into a power struggle, Tucker and Archer are forced to wander under the scorching sun, awaiting rescue.

action.name: It's Hotter Than Hell Out There

crew_archetypes.name: Dawn Trip Tucker
crew_archetypes.flavor: Tucker's shuttle tests end in disaster - he is attacked by a hostile alien, forcing him to land on a desert planet.

action.name: What The Hell Are You Doing? Are You Crazy?

crew_archetypes.name: Kyle jefe de transportadores
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kyle es muy amable, incluso con los que le apuntan en medio de la noche.

crew_archetypes.name: "Bullseye" Kyle
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kyle, transporter chief on the Enterprise, uses the device for an unintended purpose: beaming a gene therapy salve right into Spock’s eye.

crew_archetypes.name: Comandante Kruge
crew_archetypes.flavor: El comandante Kruge, capitán de un ave de presa, trató de convertir el dispositivo Génesis en un arma para los klingon.

crew_archetypes.name: Motura
crew_archetypes.flavor: A Vidiian sculptor suffering from the Phage who needed a lung transplant to save his life.

action.name: There Is No Other Way For Us To Survive

crew_archetypes.name: Miral Torres
crew_archetypes.flavor: Miral se le apareció a su hija B'Elanna a bordo de la gabarra de los muertos, durante una visión cuando estuvo a punto de morir.

crew_archetypes.name: Jennifer Sisko del espejo
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ben Sisko del universo principal contrató a Jennifer, científica de la AKC, para la rebelión terrana.

crew_archetypes.name: Jennifer Sisko
crew_archetypes.flavor: Puede que Jennifer ya no esté, pero sigue formando parte de la existencia de Ben.

action.name: Parece que confía plenamente en sus ideas
Ya no está en mis manos

crew_archetypes.name: Vedek Winn Adami
crew_archetypes.flavor: Perteneciente a la Asamblea Vedek, la franca Winn fue miembro prominente de la teología bajorana.

crew_archetypes.name: Kai Winn proscrita
crew_archetypes.flavor: Resentida al sentirse eclipsada por el emisario, Kai Winn acudió a los Kosst Amojan y Pah-Wraiths.

crew_archetypes.name: Kai Winn
crew_archetypes.flavor: After the Cardassian occupation, Winn became the first new kai, and her electoral victory was accepted as the 'Will of the Prophets'.

action.name: Honor The Prophets And They Will Always Love You

crew_archetypes.name: Croden
crew_archetypes.flavor: The male Rakhari resisted and fled the government that killed his wives. He tried to save his daughter, though not through the most honest of means.

action.name: Sometimes I Do Tell The Truth

crew_archetypes.name: Shakaar de la resistencia
crew_archetypes.flavor: Partícipe de la resistencia durante la ocupación cardasiana, Shakaar se convirtió después en primer ministro de Bajor.

crew_archetypes.name: Colonel Grat
crew_archetypes.flavor: This Tandaran officer has no intention of letting Captain Archer leap away - not when he might have intel on the Cabal.

action.name: Your Curiosity Almost Got You Killed

crew_archetypes.name: Grilka
crew_archetypes.flavor: Cuando su marido murió, Grilka, cabeza de la Casa de Grilka, accedió a casarse con Quark para no perderla.

crew_archetypes.name: Rurigan
crew_archetypes.flavor: Hombre yaderano que vivió en Yadera Prime hasta que fue conquistado. Entonces creó una recreación holográfica de su pueblo perdido.

crew_archetypes.name: Human Silik
crew_archetypes.flavor: In human form, Silik teams up with Archer after traveling back in time to find schematics for the temporal conduit.

action.name: I'd Come To Believe Your Race Was Inherently… Unaggressive

crew_archetypes.name: Lt. Commander Bryce
crew_archetypes.flavor: Being promoted to Lieutenant Commander means an increase in duties for Bryce. Will he find time to kitesurf with his new responsibilities?

action.name: I Used to Kitesurf the Biggest Waves on Manark IV

crew_archetypes.name: Altan Inigo Soong
crew_archetypes.flavor: En colaboración con Sutra, Soong construyó una baliza para contactar con los protectores de la vida sintética y proteger a las creaciones que consideraba sus hijos.

action.name: Supongo que es lo que hacen las madres

crew_archetypes.name: Yeoman Martha Landon
crew_archetypes.flavor: An engineer skilled in hand-to-hand combat. Her display of affection for Chekov angered the Vaalians, forcing her to put her skills to use.

action.name: Love Is When Two People Are...

crew_archetypes.name: 2.º comandante Jack Crusher
crew_archetypes.flavor: Como integrante de la tripulación del U.S.S. Stargazer, el segundo comandante Crusher murió en un accidente durante una misión exterior.

crew_archetypes.name: Vox
crew_archetypes.flavor: Thanks to his father, Jack Crusher was able to free himself from the Collective and escape.

action.name: The Time Of The Borg Is Over!

crew_archetypes.name: Rogue Jack Crusher
crew_archetypes.flavor: The son of two Starfleet veterans, Jack chose a different path. He conducts criminal activities and is wanted under various aliases.

crew_archetypes.name: Dr. Phlox
crew_archetypes.flavor: Phlox, oficial médico en jefe del Enterprise, nunca dejó de aprender las diferentes disciplinas de la medicina.

crew_archetypes.name: Phlox del espejo
crew_archetypes.flavor: Médico sádico sirviendo a bordo del ISS Enterprise, una nave estelar del universo espejo.

crew_archetypes.name: Phlox con nanosondas
crew_archetypes.flavor: Después de infectarse con nanosondas borg, Phlox debe pensar más como ingeniero que como médico para curar su afección.

crew_archetypes.name: Phlox con traje medioambiental
crew_archetypes.flavor: Incluso Phlox debe prestarse al entrenamiento reglamentario con el traje medioambiental.

crew_archetypes.name: Phlox tribble
crew_archetypes.flavor: Phlox lleva una pequeña cantidad de tribbles a bordo del Enterprise NX-01 como fuente de alimento sostenible para sus mascotas.

crew_archetypes.name: Starfleet Medical Phlox
crew_archetypes.flavor: Doctor Phlox is busy treating Klaang, who was injured by the Plasma Cannon.

action.name: I'll Do The Best I Can

crew_archetypes.name: Anbo-jyutsu Kyle Riker
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kyle engages in an anbo-jyutsu duel with his son Will, during which the two manage to talk about their differences and end a years-long conflict.

crew_archetypes.name: Judge Advocate Prosecutor Batel
crew_archetypes.flavor: At the tribunal in the Chin-Riley case, Batel served as prosecutor - reluctantly.

crew_archetypes.name: Away Team Batel
crew_archetypes.flavor: Batel was on a mission to Parnassus Beta when her ship USS Cayuga was suddenly attacked by the Gorn.

action.name: I Can't Go With You, You Know That

crew_archetypes.name: Comandante Barak
crew_archetypes.flavor: Capitán de la IKS Amar de clase K'tinga, Barak y su nave fueron destruidos por V'ger.

crew_archetypes.name: Cosmo Traitt
crew_archetypes.flavor: Después de que Cleveland Booker le robara su carga, Traitt lo rastrea sin descanso para acabar su entrega.

action.name: El mejor mensajero de todo el cuadrante

crew_archetypes.name: Stonn
crew_archetypes.flavor: T’Pring's colleague at work at the El-Kestanktil. Stonn is in love with her and is even ready to duel with Spock to become T’Pring's fiancé.

action.name: Got To Say, You Are Very Attractive For A Prison Guard

crew_archetypes.name: Dra. Brahms de holocubierta 3
crew_archetypes.flavor: Representación holográfica de la creadora del sistema de curvatura del Enterprise-D, la doctora Leah Brahms.

crew_archetypes.name: Consejera Troi
crew_archetypes.flavor: Es la consejera a bordo del U.S.S. Enterprise-D, y sus habilidades empáticas son inestimables para la tripulación.

crew_archetypes.name: Troi de Rakal
crew_archetypes.flavor: Bajo la guisa de mayor Rakal de los Tal Shiar, a Troi le encomendaron ayudar a los romulanos a huir a la Federación.

crew_archetypes.name: Comandante Troi
crew_archetypes.flavor: Atrapada en la Tierra en el siglo XXI, Troi ayudó a convencer a Cochrane de que emprendiera su vuelo histórico.

crew_archetypes.name: Troi oficial de puente
crew_archetypes.flavor: Troi fue ascendida a comandante de pleno derecho tras aprobar el examen para oficial de puente.

crew_archetypes.name: Diosa de la Empatía Troi
crew_archetypes.flavor: La consejera a bordo Deanna Troi fue proyectada como la diosa de la empatía en un programa de holocubierta de Reginald Barclay.

action.name: No hagas caso de las apariencias

crew_archetypes.name: Troi Durango
crew_archetypes.flavor: Una entusiasta del «Viejo Oeste» desde que era pequeña, Deanna interpretó el papel de Duranto en el holoprograma de Deadwood.

crew_archetypes.name: Troi de la era de la navegación a vela
Troi de Nepenthe
crew_archetypes.flavor: Gracias a su experiencia como consejera y madre, Troi logra conectar con Soji y aconseja a Picard sobre Nepenthe.

crew_archetypes.name: Deanna Troi de novia
crew_archetypes.flavor: Para celebrar su matrimonio, Deanna disfruta de las fiestas de su herencia humana con una recepción tradicional.

crew_archetypes.name: Night Terrors Troi
crew_archetypes.flavor: After the Enterprise finds itself drifting through a space-time anomaly, Troi becomes the only crew member who can still dream. But those dreams are nightmares during which she may not be alone.

crew_archetypes.name: Stretching Troi
crew_archetypes.flavor: Troi worries that she is losing control and shares her romantic feelings with Crusher during training.

action.name: Is It Possible To Fall In Love In One Day?

crew_archetypes.name: Talosian Keeper
crew_archetypes.flavor: The Talosian Keeper proves to be the only one capable of healing the fracture in Spock’s mind, but only at a personal cost to Burnham.

action.name: Material Illusion Is Our Primary Form Of Defense

crew_archetypes.name: Master Surchid Falow
crew_archetypes.flavor: Representing the Wadi, Falow enjoys sharing parts of their culture with the Federation, like their complex and intricate table games.

action.name: Double The Peril, Double Your Winnings
No fue la Flota Estelar la que empezó esta guerra

crew_archetypes.name: Abraham Lincoln
crew_archetypes.flavor: Simulacro del último presidente, creado por los excalbianos para examinar la diferencia entre el bien y el mal.

action.name: En la punta de mi hoja

crew_archetypes.name: Capitana Kasidy Yates
crew_archetypes.flavor: Capitana del carguero civil «Xhosa», Kasidy fue un encarcelada tiempo por traficar con cargamento maquis.

crew_archetypes.name: Kasidy Yates contrabandista
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kasidy, simpatizante de los maquis, ha ayudado a los replicadores contrabandistas de Michael Eddington a huir de los cardasianos.

crew_archetypes.name: Kasidy Danielle Yates de novia
crew_archetypes.flavor: En contra del deseo de los profetas, Kasidy se casa con Benjamin Sisko.

action.name: Vaya, casi diría que eso es una amenaza

crew_archetypes.name: Cassie
crew_archetypes.flavor: Benny Russell's single-minded fiancée, who was willing to buy out the diner so she and Benny could settle down and finally start a family.

action.name: It's All Right, It's All Right. I'm With You.
La vida está llena de opciones

crew_archetypes.name: The Preacher
crew_archetypes.flavor: A preacher appearing in Sisko’s visions of Benny Russell. His cryptic words hinted at something beyond the surface.

action.name: Go Now And Write The Truth

crew_archetypes.name: Alférez Vorik
crew_archetypes.flavor: Oficial de ingeniería a bordo del Voyager, Vorik formó parte del equipo que desarrolló el Delta Flyer.

crew_archetypes.name: Zhaban
crew_archetypes.flavor: A former Tal Shiar agent, Zhaban is now a housekeeper for Picard, and his wisdom may be the greatest thing he can offer the former officer.

crew_archetypes.name: Melora Pazlar
crew_archetypes.flavor: One of the only handful of Elaysians to have left their homeworld, Melora wishes to explore the stars without giving up being herself.

crew_archetypes.name: Nel Apgar
crew_archetypes.flavor: With the early arrival of the Enterprise, Apgar attempts to misdirect an investigation into his secretly completed project.

ship_archetypes.name: Asaltante maquis
ship_archetypes.flavor: Una nave pequeña y fácil de manejar, preferida por los maquis para escapar rápidamente y de una pieza de persecuciones hostiles.

ship_archetypes.name: Ave de presa klingon K'Vort
ship_archetypes.flavor: Una nave versátil utilizada a menudo para explorar y patrullar. La clase K'Vort es la versión más estable de este diseño.

ship_archetypes.name: Clase Nova
ship_archetypes.flavor: Designed for short-term missions of science and exploration. Features advanced sensor arrays.

ship_archetypes.name: Caza jem'hadar
ship_archetypes.flavor: A warship used by the soldier species of the Dominion. Equipped with phased polaron beam weapons

ship_archetypes.name: Val Jean
ship_archetypes.flavor: Un asaltante maquis bajo el mando de Chakotay. Esta nave quedó destruida tras chocar con la matriz del Guardián.

ship_archetypes.name: Nave de caza hirogen
ship_archetypes.flavor: Esas naves, pequeñas pero con armamento pesado, están equipadas para permitir una caza eficiente y un buen procesado de las presas.

ship_archetypes.name: Esfera borg
ship_archetypes.flavor: Las esferas borg fueron en su origen naves tácticas de largo alcance. Los cubos borg a veces albergaban esferas borg como naves auxiliares.

ship_archetypes.name: Crucero de combate clase Suurok
ship_archetypes.flavor: Las naves estelares de clase Suurok eran de las más rápidas y potentes que operaban en la flota vulcana. Se utilizaban tanto como crucero de combate como nave científica.

ship_archetypes.name: Nave de clase Miranda
ship_archetypes.flavor: Clase Miranda

ship_archetypes.name: Nave de guerra de tipo Valdore romulana
ship_archetypes.flavor: Nave de guerra de tipo Valdore

ship_archetypes.name: Nave de clase Galaxy
ship_archetypes.flavor: One of the largest and most powerful classes of ship in Starfleet's history.

actions.name: Desviar energía a los bancos de fáser
Potenciar al máximo para conseguir impulso

ship_archetypes.name: Nave de clase Defiant
ship_archetypes.flavor: Named after the initial prototype, brought into production during the Dominion War to serve as warships.

ship_archetypes.name: Nave de clase Intrepid
ship_archetypes.flavor: Designed for long-term exploration. Able to land on the surface of a planet and powered by bio-neural gel packs.

ship_archetypes.name: Nave de clase Constitution
ship_archetypes.flavor: The face of Starfleet in the 23rd century, these heavy cruisers were designed for long-term missions.

ship_archetypes.name: Crucero cardasiano Galor
ship_archetypes.flavor: El «soldado raso» de la Unión Cardasiana, veloz y destructivo. Dispone de múltiples baterías de fáseres.

ship_archetypes.name: Marauder ferengi D'Kora
ship_archetypes.flavor: An enigmatic vessel used for battle and transport. Capable of disabling a deflector shield.

actions.name: Desviar energía de la nave auxiliar

ship_archetypes.name: Nave de clase NX
ship_archetypes.flavor: The first Starfleet ships to be equipped with warp five engines, allowing exploration beyond neighboring star systems.

ship_archetypes.name: Crucero de guerra klingon K't'inga
ship_archetypes.flavor: La clase K't'inga, posterior al poderoso crucero de guerra D7, fue la principal nave de guerra del Imperio klingon a finales del siglo XXIII.

ship_archetypes.name: Clase Constellation del Imperio terrano
ship_archetypes.flavor: La clase Constellation era un crucero de guerra del Imperio terrano que entró en servicio a finales del siglo XXIII.

ship_archetypes.name: U.S.S. Enterprise NCC-1701-D
ship_archetypes.flavor: A Galaxy-class vessel famously commanded by Captain Picard. Allows for saucer separation in emergency situations.

actions.name: Potenciar al máximo para conseguir impulso
Desviar energía a los bancos de fáser

ship_archetypes.name: U.S.S. Enterprise NCC-1701
ship_archetypes.flavor: A Constitution-class vessel made legend under the command of Captain Kirk. A hardy ship that survived many encounters.

ship_archetypes.name: U.S.S. Defiant
ship_archetypes.flavor: Initially created for use against the Borg. Equipped with ablative armor and Starfleet's first legal cloaking device.

ship_archetypes.name: U.S.S. Voyager
ship_archetypes.flavor: A Intrepid-class vessel notable for being the first to explore the Delta Quadrant--if not by choice.

ship_archetypes.name: Nave de guerra romulana D'deridex
ship_archetypes.flavor: One of the largest and most advanced vessels in the quadrant. Utilizes a forced quantum singularity as a power source.

ship_archetypes.name: Nave de guerra hirogen
ship_archetypes.flavor: Esas naves, pequeñas pero con armamento pesado, están equipadas para permitir una caza eficiente y un buen procesado de las presas.

ship_archetypes.name: Esfera borg 878
ship_archetypes.flavor: Comandada por el general Kotok y otros borg rebeldes miembros de la Unimatriz Cero en 2377.

ship_archetypes.name: I.S.S. Avenger
ship_archetypes.flavor: El I.S.S. Avenger, una nave de combate de clase NX registrada como NX-09, sirvió junto al I.S.S. Enterprise en el siglo XXII. Conoció su fin a manos del U.S.S. Defiant.

ship_archetypes.name: La Sirena
ship_archetypes.flavor: Un carguero ligero F17 Kaplan en alquiler, capitaneado por Ríos. Dotado con varios holoprogramas para ayudar en varias situaciones de emergencia.

ship_archetypes.name: Nave tholiana
ship_archetypes.flavor: Equipado con un regulador de energía y la capacidad de crear la infame red tholiana, un campo tractor casi impenetrable.

ship_archetypes.name: NX-01 Enterprise generacional
ship_archetypes.flavor: Atrapados en el siglo XXI, la tripulación del Enterprise se embarcó en un viaje multigeneracional para evitar que su pasado volviera a convertirse en el futuro del Enterprise.

ship_archetypes.name: U.S.S. T'Kumbra
ship_archetypes.flavor: Comandada por el condecorado capitán Solok, esta nave de clase Nebula con tripulación exclusivamente vulcana estuvo en el frente de la Guerra del Dominio.

ship_archetypes.name: Barcaza de Harrad-Sar
ship_archetypes.flavor: Mientas finges estar al mando de una nave minera, Harrad-Sar ha comenzado una operación para hacerse con el control del Enterprise y hacer que caiga en manos de Orión.

ship_archetypes.name: Nave de exportación de Malon
ship_archetypes.flavor: Una nave de transporte de residuos volátiles con una esperanza de vida notoriamente baja para su tripulación.

ship_archetypes.name: U.S.S. Yeager
ship_archetypes.flavor: Este crucero ligero se usó a menudo durante la Guerra del Dominio para proteger Espacio profundo nueve.

ship_archetypes.name: Nave karemma
ship_archetypes.flavor: Una nave que usan los karemma, una especie del cuadrante Gamma y parte del Dominio. Equipada con sistemas de defensa y ataque únicos.

ship_archetypes.name: Gorn Raider
ship_archetypes.flavor: Gorn Raiders were ships belonging to the Gorn Hegemony equipped with weapons said to be more powerful than phasers.

ship_archetypes.name: Kovaalan Ship
ship_archetypes.flavor: Small, nimble ships that attacked the Enterprise during its attempt to cut through a subspace corridor to reach the homeworld of the Xindi Council.

ship_archetypes.name: U.S.S. Vancouver
ship_archetypes.flavor: A Parliament-class engineering ship shouldered with a surprising amount of epic missions. Too many, according to one crew member.

ship_archetypes.name: U.S.S. Thunderchild
ship_archetypes.flavor: This 24th century Akira-class ship incorporates a multitude of tactical systems mainly focused on battle scenarios. In the wrong hands, it could be a deadly weapon.

ship_archetypes.name: U.S.S. Cochrane
ship_archetypes.flavor: With a history of transporting some of Starfleet’s finest, the U.S.S. Cochrane was put to the test battling in the Dominion War.

ship_archetypes.name: Arctic One
ship_archetypes.flavor: Borg assimilated ship equipped with cutting beams and proton weapons.

ship_archetypes.name: The Dove
ship_archetypes.flavor: The Dove, a top spot for rest and recovery, is where the Cerritos engineers are sent to recuperate.

ship_archetypes.name: U.S.S. Farragut
ship_archetypes.flavor: In alternate timeline, U.S.S. Farragut took part in the battle with the Bird-of-Prey after Captain Kirk responded to a distress call from Outpost 4.

ship_archetypes.name: Vidiian Warship
ship_archetypes.flavor: A warship utilized by the Vidiians loaded with heavy weaponry.

ship_archetypes.name: Tsunkatse Vessel
ship_archetypes.flavor: Penk’s starship that was used as the main base for a live spectacle of Tsunkatse matches.

ship_archetypes.name: I.S.S. Buran
ship_archetypes.flavor: Gabriel Lorca’s Cardenas-class starship that was destroyed by Emperor Philippa Georgiou.

ship_archetypes.name: Booker's Ship
ship_archetypes.flavor: A scout ship owned by Cleveland Booker in the 32nd century.

ship_archetypes.name: U.S.S. Voyager NCC-74656-J
ship_archetypes.flavor: The 11th Intrepid-class starship with the name Voyager operated by Starfleet in the late 32nd century.

ship_archetypes.name: Cubo borg
ship_archetypes.flavor: A smaller version of the Collective's ubiquitous and fearsome cubical spacecraft. Features self-repairing systems.

ship_archetypes.name: H.M.S. Bounty
ship_archetypes.flavor: Un ave de presa klingon dirigido por el almirante James T. Kirk. El médico jefe Leonard «Bones» McCoy la apodó Bounty.

ship_archetypes.name: I.S.S. Enterprise NCC-1701
ship_archetypes.flavor: A Constitution-class vessel made legend under the command of Captain Kirk. A hardy ship that survived many encounters.

ship_archetypes.name: Krayton D'Kora
ship_archetypes.flavor: An enigmatic vessel used for battle and transport. Capable of disabling a deflector shield.

actions.name: Desviar energía de la nave auxiliar

ship_archetypes.name: Prakesh
ship_archetypes.flavor: La nave de clase Galor de Gul Dukat, famosa por su servicio en la Guerra Klingon-Cardasiana.

ship_archetypes.name: Enterprise NX-01
ship_archetypes.flavor: The flagship of United Earth Starfleet, pivotal in founding the Coalition of Planets, a precursor to the UFP.

ship_archetypes.name: IKS T'Ong
ship_archetypes.flavor: La IKS T'Ong, un crucero de guerra klingon de clase K't'inga, ganó renombre durante una misión crucial bajo el mando del legendario capitán K'Temoc.

ship_archetypes.name: U.S.S. Shenzhou
ship_archetypes.flavor: Una nave de clase Caminante que participó en la Batalla de las Estrellas Binarias. Su lema: «todo cuanto existe es una sola cosa».

ship_archetypes.name: U.S.S. Discovery
ship_archetypes.flavor: La tripulación del U.S.S. Discovery, nave científica pionera, ideó un método para recorrer grandes distancias en pocos segundos y de forma segura con su motor de esporas.

ship_archetypes.name: Sarcophagus klingon
ship_archetypes.flavor: La Sarcophagus, nave insignia de la casa de T'Kuvma, estaba acorazada con miles de ataúdes que contenían los restos de guerreros klingon conocidos como la «Flota Negra».

actions.name: La voluntad de la Flota Negra

ship_archetypes.name: I.S.S. Defiant
ship_archetypes.flavor: El I.S.S. Defiant fue construido a partir de planos obtenidos en el universo principal. Fue comandado por «Smiley» O'Brien del espejo para liderar la insurgencia contra el regente Worf.

ship_archetypes.name: Crucero de guerra andoriano Kumari
ship_archetypes.flavor: Un crucero de guerra andoriano, el primero de su tipo, llamado igual que el primer rompehielos que circunnavegó Andoria.

ship_archetypes.name: Interceptor del Sindicato de Orión
ship_archetypes.flavor: Una nave ligeramente armada del Sindicato de Orión.

ship_archetypes.name: Ni'Var
ship_archetypes.flavor: El alto mando de Vulcano ha enviado la nave Ni'Var para trasladar a la subcomandante T'Pol después de su implicación en la destrucción del monasterio vulcano de P'Jem.

ship_archetypes.name: U.S.S. Reliant
ship_archetypes.flavor: U.S.S. Reliant

ship_archetypes.name: Nave de guerra de mando breen
El Valdore
ship_archetypes.flavor: El Valdore, una nave de guerra romulana de tipo Valdore, luchó junto al U.S.S. Enterprise contra la nave de guerra remana Scimitar en la batalla de la Grieta Bassen.

ship_archetypes.name: Cohete del capitán Protón
ship_archetypes.flavor: ¡EL heroico capitán Protón utiliza su cohete con armamento pesado para defender la Tierra de los ruines villanos!

ship_archetypes.name: U.S.S. Enterprise NCC-1701-A
ship_archetypes.flavor: Esta nave de clase Constitución es la segunda de la Federación que lleva el nombre de Enterprise. Está equipada con mejoras tácticas y un potente motor con núcleo de curvatura.

ship_archetypes.name: Nave patrulla xindi insectoide
ship_archetypes.flavor: Esta pequeña nave estelar que utilizan los xindi insectoides está equipada con varios emisores de armas de energía dirigidos. Como nave patrulla, se la conoce por su velocidad y capacidad de maniobra.

ship_archetypes.name: El Scimitar
ship_archetypes.flavor: A heavily-armed warship constructed by Shinzon for the sole purpose of overthrowing the Romulan Empire.

ship_archetypes.name: U.S.S. Enterprise NCC-1701-E
ship_archetypes.flavor: Una nave estelar de clase Sovereign que, tras derrotar a un cubo borg, regresó en el tiempo para impedir que los borg interfiriesen en el primer contacto entre humanos y vulcanos.

ship_archetypes.name: Cardasiana de clase Keldon
ship_archetypes.flavor: Una nave de guerra cardasiana utilizada durante el siglo XXIV. Bajo las órdenes de la Orden Obsidiana y el Tal Shiar romulano se introdujeron mejoras de camuflaje en varias de estas naves.

ship_archetypes.name: Voyager asimilado
ship_archetypes.flavor: Tras un ataque lanzado por una nave de la especie 8472, el cubo borg defiende al Voyager. Janeway acepta una alianza temporal con los borg que comienza con la asimilación de su nave.

ship_archetypes.name: Caza de la Federación
ship_archetypes.flavor: El avanzadísimo caza de la Federación entró en acción de verdad por primera vez contra Control en Xahea.

ship_archetypes.name: El Artefacto
ship_archetypes.flavor: Esta nave borg está aislada del Colectivo y era un centro investigación y rehabilitación para exborgs. Ahora está activa y su cámara de la reina, su población borg y su sistema de reparaciones se han activado.

actions.name: Protocolos de teletransporte de la reina

ship_archetypes.name: Nave arma krenim
ship_archetypes.flavor: Desarrollado por Annorax para eliminar amenazas contra el Imperio krenim mediante la manipulación del continuo espacio-tiempo.

ship_archetypes.name: IKS Hegh'ta
ship_archetypes.flavor: Una nave de guerra klingon capitaneada por el general Martok. Encabezó un ataque contra el Espacio profundo nueve, acción que disolvió la alianza Federación-Klingon.

ship_archetypes.name: Nave de la Reina Borg
ship_archetypes.flavor: Los borg utilizan esta nave para transportar a la Reina Borg dentro de una cámara blindada que, aun así, tiene una inmensa capacidad destructiva en la vanguardia de las acciones de asimilación.

ship_archetypes.name: Voyager nave de guerra
ship_archetypes.flavor: Según las historias kirianas, esta nave de guerra gobernada por la brutal capitana Janeway aterrorizó al pueblo kiriano con armas biogénicas.

ship_archetypes.name: I.S.S. Discovery
ship_archetypes.flavor: Capitaneado por la temible Sylvia «Killy» Tilly, el I.S.S. Discovery fue destruido por las fuerzas Klingon al llegar al universo principal.

ship_archetypes.name: U.S.S. Prometheus
ship_archetypes.flavor: Los modos de asalto experimentales y la capacidad de factor de curvatura 9,99 de esta nave de la Federación la convirtieron en un objetivo prioritario para los secuestradores romulanos.

ship_archetypes.name: U.S.S. Excelsior
ship_archetypes.flavor: El Excelsior, la primera nave de la Flota Estelar en la que implementaron el motor transcurvatura, pasó a ser comandada por el capitán Sulu.

ship_archetypes.name: Crucero xindi-acuático
ship_archetypes.flavor: Esta elegante nave hidrodinámica es la más grande y avanzada de las muchas especies xindis.

ship_archetypes.name: NX-02 Columbia
ship_archetypes.flavor: Con la capitana Hernández al mando, la segunda nave de clase NX estaba provista de un motor de curvatura cinco, con revestimiento del casco mejorado y un cambio en el equipamiento de armas en comparación con su predecesora.

ship_archetypes.name: U.S.S. Glenn
ship_archetypes.flavor: La tripulación del Glenn, nave hermana del U.S.S. Discovery, asumió grandes riesgos para desarrollar más rápidamente su motor de esporas, lo cual tuvo un resultado desastroso.

ship_archetypes.name: U.S.S. Roddenberry
ship_archetypes.flavor: Este estilo de nave atemporal sigue prestando servicio en la Federación, proporcionando valiosas lecciones y experiencias a los miembros de la tripulación, tanto a los nuevos como a los antiguos.

ship_archetypes.name: U.S.S. Raven
ship_archetypes.flavor: This Raven-type exploration vessel carried Magnus and Erin Hansen with their daughter Annika - the first humans to make contact with the Borg.

ship_archetypes.name: U.S.S. Phoenix
ship_archetypes.flavor: Una nave de clase Nebula comandada por el capitán Maxwell, que se volvió un justiciero al destruir un puesto avanzado cardasiano y varias naves en el sector 21505.

actions.name: Barrido de sensores de alta energía
Cortina de fuego de torpedo de fotones

ship_archetypes.name: U.S.S. Hiawatha
ship_archetypes.flavor: Una fragata médica del siglo XXIII que se perdió durante la guerra entre la Federación y los klingon.

ship_archetypes.name: Romulan Bird-of-Prey
ship_archetypes.flavor: With an avian-inspired design, this vessel was in use by the Romulan military during the 23rd century.

ship_archetypes.name: IKS Bortas
ship_archetypes.flavor: A Klingon Battlecruiser that was Chancellor Gowron's flagship during the Klingon Civil War. Was the primary warship of the Klingons.

ship_archetypes.name: Gomtuu
ship_archetypes.flavor: As a sentient organic creature, Gomtuu exists as a cosmic vessel. After the death of its crew, it wandered through space, seeking to assuage its loneliness.

ship_archetypes.name: U.S.S. Constellation NCC-1017
ship_archetypes.flavor: Captained by Commodore Matt Decker, the U.S.S. Constellation NCC-1017 was the first Federation ship to encounter the dreaded Doomsday Machine.

ship_archetypes.name: U.S.S. Cerritos
ship_archetypes.flavor: The U.S.S. Cerritos is a California-class engineering and operations support cruiser that endured many perilous events, but kept going, against all odds.

ship_archetypes.name: Sikarian Vessel
ship_archetypes.flavor: There is little to be known about the technology surrounding this vessel due to the secretiveness of the Sikarians. Their Canon of Laws simply forbid sharing their knowledge.

ship_archetypes.name: U.S.S. Le Guin
ship_archetypes.flavor: This 32nd century starship, registered as NCC-325060, is the peak of technology and one of the best scout vessels available to the Federation.

ship_archetypes.name: NX-01 Refit
ship_archetypes.flavor: After years of dealing with unknowns, The NX-01 was refitted with major upgrades based on everything learned throughout its adventures.

ship_archetypes.name: The Serene Squall
ship_archetypes.flavor: The Serene Squall was a pirate ship captained by Angel, who carried out their intricate plan to capture the Enterprise.

ship_archetypes.name: R'ongovian Flagship
ship_archetypes.flavor: A solar sailship used by the R'ongovian Protectorate for ceremonial occasions.

ship_archetypes.name: U.S.S. Enterprise NCC-1701-J
ship_archetypes.flavor: The ship took part in the Battle of Procyon V and successfully attacked  Sphere-Builders  so they were forced into interdimensional space.

ship_archetypes.name: The Shrike
ship_archetypes.flavor: Captained by the Changeling Vadic, The Shrike was a formidable warship loaded with all kinds of devastating weaponry.

ship_archetypes.name: Gorn Destroyer
ship_archetypes.flavor: A powerful Gorn vessel of intimidating size armed with plasma cannons and the flexibility to function within a planet's atmosphere as well as out.

ship_archetypes.name: U.S.S. Enterprise NCC-1701-C
ship_archetypes.flavor: An Ambassador-class ship that played the key role in securing a Treaty of Alliance between the Klingon Empire and the Federation.

ship_archetypes.name: U.S.S. Yang
ship_archetypes.flavor: This Friendship-class starship was a part of the flotilla that greeted Discovery after the victory over Viridian.

ship_archetypes.name: U.S.S. Uhura
ship_archetypes.flavor: A Reliant-class starship utilized by Starfleet in the early 25th century.

ship_archetypes.name: Orion Vessel
ship_archetypes.flavor: A light pirate vessel used by Orion Syndicate.

ship_archetypes.name: Monaveen
ship_archetypes.flavor: A Hysperian cruiser owned by Queen Paolana utilizing a number of antiquated technologies.

ship_archetypes.name: Borg Tactical Cube
ship_archetypes.flavor: Heavily armed Borg cube that opposed the U.S.S. Voyager to stop the deployment of a nanovirus and protect the Collective.

ship_archetypes.name: U.S.S. Titan
ship_archetypes.flavor: A Luna-class capital ship captained by Riker during the late 24th century.
